comment: We bought two pairs for each child to use at school during their classroom Ipad time. Each child had issues after the first week with connection and after a month sound problems with one side ultimately losing sound in one side. These look like nice quality headphones for kids but we were so sad they didn't hold up longer than a month and passed the return window. If you want headphones to last longer than a month don't buy these
Model BH2978, suppose to have mic. If it has one, the the package does not  mention it, and it doesn't work. Tried with three different devices. Waste of money and time. :(

These are so small they don’t fit my 9-year-old, which isn’t the issue.  The issue is that Amazon will only allow me to drop it off at one location in my area, and it’s actually not near me.  Every other item I’ve needed to return can be returned at my local UPS drop off. How could I have possibly known this wouldn’t be the case for these headphones?!Amended: I haven't changed my mind about the headphones, but the company is pretty awesome. They wrote and sent me a pair of headphones that are fitting and match the description. I am giving them 5 stars for the stellar customer service!

My baby girl needed to have a pair of headphones that actually fit and we didn't have to worry about it harming her hearing in case she tried to turn it up too loud.  These fit her head perfectly, they didn't slide around or fall off, they're also very cute (love the colors) and I love the feature of toning down the decibels (dB) so as to not harm young delicate hearing, which was my concern with headphones.  Perfect; I definitely recommend for parents to get for their little ones.

EDIT: MPOW reached out and is sending me replacements for the headphones that broke. It's great that they're standing behind their products like that. I've bought other MPOW products that have been great, so at this point, I'm just going to assume it was a bad batch. Great customer service.---

After 7 months one of the headphones has stopped working,  my square trade plan won't replace it because it's under manufacturing warranty but trying to contact the company for the warranty is a joke! No one responds. Theres no phone number and the one email I got seriously asked me if I tried them in a different device! Now I have a nagging 9 year old that cant use her headphones!

Overall nice headphones for kids. The main reason I chose these was because another set could be plugged in for sharing sound to a sibling or friend. I'm unhappy that the cord is not the nice braided fabric that doesn't tangle. This cord is the rubber that seems to stick to everything and can snag hair. I may have to return the 3 I bought for my kids for that reason.

Bought 2 of these for my daughters. They are doing the virtual learning at home, and these work great. You get what you pay for with the price, but the plus side is that these work great for their intended function. My kids can hear their teacher perfectly, and when they speak, the teacher can hear them as well. Not sure as to the noise cancelling properties, as it is already quiet for them, but one would assume that they work at least somewhat. Overall a great buy.

I purchased these headphones for my child's learning program they use at school on tablets. For the price point, I was extremely pleased with the fit and quality of the product, as well as the performance. I especially liked the ability to set the volume to a lower limit. While not childproof, it helped me to teach my child that listening to sounds too loud can hurt their hearing if they aren't careful, and acts as a safety for them as they use it. He's been able to use it on all media so far without turning the limit off, so it's a well placed limit in my estimation.
My daughter uses it in school for class and she says it is very comfortable and easy to use, her classmates admire it, and she wants another pair for at home use. :)

These headphones, so far, are very well made. They are extremely bendable, almost to the point of being a little floppy. This is good though for kids who may be a little rough on their headphones. The color is pretty, and looks exactly as pictured. They don't look or feel cheap or flimsy. My 9 year old has these for school to use with her chromebook. She says they're comfortable to where, and unlike others, she's not spending time pushing them up and adjusting them, as she has had to do with the others she had in the past. They're not too big or too small, and adjust easily. As for the sound, no complaint. They sound very clear. The volume control is a little confusing. Either the volume is low, and is controlled, or it's loud, and not volume controlled. I was expecting a normal volume+/- button, and automatic volume control for kids. This is not a bad thing, since she's older and won't voluntarily blast her eardrums out, but if you're looking for something to send to school with a child, that is controlled and doesn't get too loud, this is not it.As for shipping, the headphones were nearly folded and incased in bubble wrap, then secured in a product box. The box showed a diagram, and there was an instruction pamphlet inside. The box itself was inside another large Amazon box, and well protected with more bubble wrap. It arrived on time and in good shape. No complaints on shipping.

Awesome! The cords do not tangle! I keep seeing my twins putting the cords in their mouths, and I feel better knowing it's food grade. they are almost 8 and they are still do not handle electronics as nice as they should. So far, a little over a week, they are holding up perfectly!. I have witness them being sat on by an adult, dropped, and carelessly knocked to the hardwood floor. No dings, scratches, and worries so far!

First, let me say we've tried a TON of different kids headphones, most of which don't last more than 6-8 months. I was really excited about these because they seemed more sturdy, plus they are much more comfortable than most since they go over the ear. Sound is great, comfort is great, they fold together nicely and easily. These were the perfect pair of kid headphones, until they stopped working.We took such good care of these, always putting them up right after use, in hopes that they would last longer.  They died after less than a month of gentle use. The sound will come in every once in awhile, but just cuts out again. Maybe they were defective from the start with a loose wire or something.

Who wants to be driven crazy having to listen to their kids' crappy shows/music/games/whatever on their tablets and whatnot?  At the same time, kids are dumb and turn up the sound in headphones to levels that are dangerous for their hearing.  Enter limited decibel headphones.  We've had several types over the years and our family really likes these ones.  They're pretty comfortable and take a decent amount of beating.  If problems do come up, the seller is easy to work with and helped replace things quickly.  The best part is the extra port to allow headphones to chain with each other.  I'm not sure the sound quality is great when you do that, but that isn't the point-it's to let all the kids listen to the show or game on the same device without fighting and it works great for that.  My kids love to cuddle up together, headphones connected, and watch the same show on a tablet or the Wii U.

I bought two of these for my kids. They Worked well for about a month then both started glitching constantly and after 2 months they both quit working. I contacted Amazon since the return period had expired and they refunded me (not fully for some reason but I think that has to do with my payment method, not sure). I replaced these with a different brand and went Bluetooth. Cost a bit more but still inexpensive. The corded headphones are just awful quality and break quickly.

My daughter loves it and color is just what we were looking for.. used it in the plane and she was on her own cloud nine..quality of sound is great not to mention price is really inexpensive for the sound quality u will experience.

My daughter loves these. The soft padding for the ears and in the band for the head make it comfortable and I love that there is a switch to change the volume max on the cord, just be sure to talk to your kids about the safety of protecting their ears. Getting ready to purchase another in a different color!

We bought two different kinds of headphones for our kids to use on our long road-trip coming up.I was nervous the sound on these would be too quiet for driving. I personally tried them out (they fit my adult head as well as my 6 year olds head) when we were going 70 mph with music going on in the car and the family talking, and I was still able to clearly hear the audiobook I was listening too.

I was really disappointed that these absolutely DO NOT LIMIT the volume to any safe level, but especially not to 85dB. I didn't even turn these up to full volume while wearing them because it was too loud for my ears. I compared them to our 2 other sets of headphones that have been great at limiting noise; those kept the volume at a comfortable level. Another thing that wasn't a good design is that they made the volume-limiting switch too easy for the child to access and use. So, we are going back getting the ONANOFF BuddyPhones Inflight, Volume-Limiting Kids Headphones which have worked great for us, although a bit pricier.

Bought these for 3 yr old and 6 yr old grandkids. They love using the headphones to watch and listen to videos on their iPad and listen to my iPod music. Perfect to be able to connect together on one device. I can use my personal headphone to connect to one of theirs which is connected to the headphone that is connected to a device so all 3 of us could listen. My different headphone only has a cord so nobody can connect to me so we do it their way. ( Perfect headphones have good volume for kids and grandma. They used them easily on their first plane trip. They also fit adults too. They feel soft on our ears.

The headphones are great! My kids actually want to wear them. They are comfortable and durable. I like how you can plug one headphone into the other and both kids can listen to same tablet. The head phones have a volume control so no matter how "loud" they turn it up the headphones keep it low enough so there is no damage to the ears (no more annoying repeat movies/songs!)

Very good headphones for my daughters! These are very comfortable to wear, adjustable (my 4 year old can wear it comfortably and so can I), it's very soft to the touch and the part that goes on your ears is very squishy. The wire is braided and seems to be high quality. We haven't used the microphone portion yet, but intend to when distance learning starts. I love that you can plug one headphone into another and share the hearing! This means my 2 daughters can listen at the same time, while sharing 1 screen. Great product, worth the money, would buy again, highly recommend.

I purchased this for my 6 year old son to communicate virtually for distance learning. He has been using it for video calls with his grandparents and friends. He has also learned to use it on his Amazon device to listen to his shows during night time (yes, I now enabled screen time settings, but I thought that was a latter in life thing).The mic is perfect for him and the grandparents are able to hear him clearly. My kid has a very small head and this fits him well. He said it is very comfortable. When I touch the padding, I feel it is quite soft. I will most likely be purchasing this again next year (if it doesn't last).

I bought these headphones for my 4th grade son with disabilities last year for school opting for another brand for my daughter in kindergarten and hers broke after only a few months while this brand lasted all year of school, through long car trips this last summer and are back to work at school this year as well. When it came time to order a new one for my daughter we made the obvious choice and went with these headphones. Lots of fun color choices, my kids love how comfortable they are and easy to use and they are DURABLE! The shipping was fast and they are definitely worth the price. I put their names on the inside of the headband and it’s also lasted so they don’t get mixed up with classmates.
The cable came out after the 1st 30 minutes of use

These are super comfortable, and fit my 5 year old perfectly! She absolutely loves them. I bought them back in April, but my sister just asked me if I "knew of any kids headphones that I would recommend," and I recommended these to her. I figured if I was going to (quite literally) recommend them to her, I should probably also recommend them to other amazon shoppers! These have a great rating already, and with good reason. The cord is durable, and the headset itself is super soft and comfy, which is important for pretty much anything being worn by a kid (especially a sensitive one like mine). So yes, I recommend these. :-)

Firstly, just let me say that these are great headphones for kids. Good sound quality, built in microphone, and safe with the volume limiter.My daughter uses these for her online  school lessons. BUT!!
Buy these every school year for my son.  They hold up for about a year of 7 year old use. Fast shipping.

EDIT: MPOW graciously sent us a replacement and so far it works great.  We actually have 3 of these now (purchased 2 originally and received a replacement for the defective pair).  We will see how the other 2 hold up to kids, but we are pleased with the customer support!Original 2 star review: We purchased these for our 4 year old. They worked well at first, except the top of the head strap has started cracking! It's been getting worse over time as he takes them on and off. We aren't rough with them. I think soon they won't be usable.

Love these! We now have three of them. They sit nicely on all of my children’s ears ages: 3, 5, 8 & 10.  They had never had headphones before and recently went on an airplane and we needed them for the trip. Good quality, fits well, room to grow, goes over the ear not on the ear, good sound level limits. I didn’t listen to anything on the airplane to know if it has good noise reduction. But everything else was great. They fold up nicely as well. I even returned another type to get more of these before our trip. I wish they had come with a small drawstring bag to keep them safe but that’s my only complaint.

Update: since my last review the company had immediately sent out a new pair of headphones. Thank God!! I didn't even know they had until it showed up at my door. I had bought another headphone but My son wears these all day. So the other brand is just sitting there. These headphones are durable and sounds good and not too loud with us s concern. You can study the decibal woohoo is kid friendly and perfect!! A must buy.It was wonderful! Being home and everyone on their own device

Love these headphones! I got these for my girls because every $15 pair of headphones I've bought for them were destroyed in no time, so I decided to try something with a little more quality. As soon as I held these in my hands and tried them on, I could tell I made the right choice, they look good and feel great! My first concern with these was the volume. With headphones being so quite these days, even on full blast, I was concerned that these decibel limited headphones would be TOO quite for my kids to hear them but, to my surprise, they were plenty loud enough without being too loud. My second and only other concern was the size. I've gone through several "kids" sized over the ear headphones that, even at the smallest setting, were too big to fit their heads, making them completely useless. Not these ones, they fit perfect on the kiddos and even fit great on me. I'm so pleased with this purchase, they have absolutely everything I was looking for in a pair of headphones and I would happily but them again.

Good headphone With good sound. My son wore them for a week and easily snapped the ear piece. Patozon customer service team Was gracious enough to send another pair that my son is enjoying and taking great care of.I have to be honest but I was not expecting this type of service so kudos to Patozon for replacing the broken headphones.

These are not actually volume limited. I just tested on my child’s iPad and when I increased the volume they went way too loud for safe listening with either volume selection in place (85db and 95db). I already threw away the packaging but will likely be looking for something else that is actually safe for children’s hearing. I do not recommend.

We needed new headphones because our kid was always complaining he could hear our music or conversation when he had his old headphones on. We bought these and tried them on first- he said they were very comfortable and he liked the top part that had some cushion. We then used them for a 3 hour car ride. No complaints from him about our music from the radio, and he got to enjoy plenty of shows using his iPad. They stay on his head well (he's about to be 6, for size reference) and we can't hear his show or audio from outside the headphones. Thumbs up all around.

Overall the headphones were comfortable and sounded great.  The problem was that the button was faulty. it would  kick you out of class, skip ahead in tracks or podcasts, very frustrating, thought we were getting a good product based on the reviews.  However went to return them and I am just 3 days outside of the return window and now I'm stuck with a faulty product.  So unfortunate, cant say I would recommend these because I dont know what they are like when they are working correctly.

The first time I ordered these, I thought I had made a good purchase. They were very comfortable. My son, who is autistic, loved the blue and didn't mind them on his ears, (which is a big deal). After a couple of months he told me they didn't work anymore. Sure enough, I tried them and the sound had quit in one of the ear pieces...then altogether. I thought maybe I had just bought a lemon or that my son hadn't taken good care of them when I wasn't looking and re-ordered the same pair again in June of this year. They are already NOT WORKING!!! Same issue again!!!! I KNOW they have been taken care of and haven't been used much at all. I am so disappointed!

I bought 3 pairs of these headphones in different colors for my two sons (10, 8) and my daughter (6) to go with their laptops while doing school at home during the COVID-19 sheltering at home since they were all sharing a space.  They all love them and say they are very good.  My eldest does complain that they can make your ears hurt if you wear them for a very long time, but I think that may be because he is approaching teenager size and they may be too small to fully cover his ears comfortably.  (My daughter also complained, but she wears glasses, and we figured out she just needed to adjust the band width to get it to fit properly over her ears and glasses comfortably.)  I have used them a few times to help them on Zoom meetings and Hangouts calls and I was impressed with the sound quality and how comfortable they were.  Also, the noise cancellation is almost too good.  They can't hear anything outside of what they are listening to, so you have to usually tap them on the shoulder to get their attention, as even yelling may not guarantee getting their attention.  I also really like how they have a volume control so they can't continually increase the volume, so their hearing is protected.  All in all, a great quality for bargain price.  I would definitely get them again.

Going on a six-hour road trip with my daughter and I tested the headphones as soon as I received the package and they are wonderful.  So far so good.  I hope it lasts.  I bought the apple adapter, since we have iPhones and it all works very well.  The headphones are soft and comfortable; and the colors are SPOT ON.  Thanks

Update:I gave this product a 3-star review at first (around early June), because it came with the volume limiting feature not working properly. I didn't expect to receive a refund or replacement as it's been months since the purchase. I was surprised and very happy to receive a brand new working headphones in the mail shortly after my previous review. Really good customer service! Thumbs up!

These little cuties are great! After spending 1/2 a day in my office with my 4yo when he had no school, I ordered these IMMEDIATELY. They have been excellent and I can’t wait to give them a try on our next road trip. He uses them with his tablet to play games and watch videos. I like the volume restriction on them since he is one of those kids who has to have everything loud. I know his hearing is protected  with these! Only regret may be not doing Bluetooth/wireless ones... with the Apple products now having lightening, it is a little cumbersome. But they are really to be used with his Kindle Fire, so it hasn’t presented too much of an issue. And they are just super cute to boot!
Got these for my 6 year old daughter and she loves them. She flipped out with the color and kept marveling over it, she tried them over youtube videos and gave her approval with sound and comfort.

Great headphones for kids. They have adjustable volume control where its either below 85dB or if in a noisey area you can switch it to have a max of 95dB. The ones I purchased were the dark blue/green ones and  they are WIRED ones. They are very soft cushy material at the ears and the curve that goes on the top of the head which my 7 yr old says he loves. The ear muff parts also fold up into themselves towards the curved part that goes above the head so they are more compact and can transport eaiser. These ones also have a neat feature where you can attach another headphone set to them so you can share the same video/music/movie that one child is watching. I have bought the lighter blue pair in the past about a yr ago and those ones were just as good but could be both wired or Bluetooth so I assumed these were going to be the same but they are only WIRED, not a deal breaker for me as my child uses them with the cord anyways we just liked the option in case the cord was lost or the device didn't have a headphone jack. I would recommend these to anyone with kids due to the volume level adjustment limits as those are important and just because they are soft and work great! I have personally not listened to them myself so I have no first hand experience however my 7 yr old is loving them and uses them all the time which is why after a year with the old set he needed a new pair, they broke at the part where they extend and can fold up inside themselves more than likely from the roughness of a then 6yr old opening them and folding them countless times within a year, the sound quality and all that never failed and they still work just are taped in one spot lol! If your on the fence about them I say go for it they are great and I have bought other types of blutooth headphones from the mpow company and have always have great experiences with all of my purchases!

I bought this for my daughter, and can't attest to the quality of the sound, though it seemed fine to her. Unfortunately after a couple of months of use the headphones broke on one side. I don't think that my daughter has done anything to them, it was just normal use, and she's been using other headphones without them breaking. So I imagine that these are flimsier than the others.Edit: After posting this, I got contacted by HBH US, who said that this is covered under warranty and they will send a new one. We'll see how this goes but for now I'm increasing the rating from 3 to 4 stars.

My 8 year old daughter uses them for school and recreationally for music or occassionally for watching something on a tablet. She LOVES the color blue of her Mpow headphones and says the headphones are incredibly comfortable to wear.

I was actually surprised that these fit my two-year-old's little head perfectly! I thought they were going to be a little big on him but I actually had to adjust the size to make them a little bigger to fit his head. They are very soft and he seems very comfortable wearing them. I bought these to go with his new Amazon kids tablet. They work great. I would definitely recommend.

We were so excited to receive these headphones as the reviews convinced me they were perfect for my child, and according to my child, "they are awesome!". They fit well on little heads and the ears, and are very steady. The hearing protection with the volume control between the two decibels (dB) is such a good way to keep high volume away from children's ears. I purchased the headphones for the school's virtual learning program, and so far so good. Overall, I highly recommend them!

update: nothing wrong with product. It was a laptop issue that did not recognize that I plugged in a headset. After some laptop program update everything now works. Kids love the headphones. They are super comfortable and don’t hurt their ears for long period usage. Would definitely buy.Have an issue big issue. Purchased this because kids need to use zoom for school and these headphones have a mic but I cannot get the mic to work on our dell laptops. For some reason when we plug the headphone jack in the mic off the headphone wire does not work/ get recognized and laptop still uses laptop mic. Please help. Other than that kids love the headphones. Feel great and sound great with volume dampener control.

I can't say enough good things about these headphones! I purchased for my 4 year old son to save myself from the awful sounds his tablet was making while he played games. And if I had listen to one more song from Disney's Zombies...I was going to lose my mind! He absolutely loves them! The noise canceling MUST work well because he's always shouting "WHAT!?" when we try and talk to him while he's wearing them. These have been a savior for me...they've given me some much needed peace and quiet. My son loves them too! We're on our second pair now.

I ordered these headphones in the blue, teal, and pink. The blue and teal are wonderful- came just as described. But the pink pair is slightly different. The cord is braided instead of being rubber and it doesn't come out of the headphone jack like the other two do. They are minor differences, but I really want to be able to unplug the cord from the headphones. The model number on the box is slightly different than what's listed in the description too. This is the second pair they've sent me, as I requested a return on the original pair that was wrong, and they just sent the same exact (wrong) pair. I will be returning the pink pair and ordering something else, which is disappointing because the other two do seem like decent headphones.Some pros of the headphones are that they fit all 3 of my kids, ranging from 20 months to 5 years and the volume control and sound is great.

So cute! Awesome how they hook together so you only need to plug one in. But really terrible volume! Not for loud cars or activities. So hard to hear and not noise cancelling at all. I would return them and try something else if we hadn’t already tried them multiple times. Which is a bummer because they’re so cute and convenient.
Great all across the board

The headphones work just fine and seem to be comfortable. The only frustration I have is that the cord isn't attached to the headphones so it can get disconnected easily. These are for my five year old and I'm sure this will happen a lot and he's going to get frustrated with it. Understandably so...I have a pair that disconnect easily too and it drives me insane as well. I know it's readily pictured and described invest detail so that's my own fault for not thinking about it when I ordered but that's the only thing that is a negative.
Bought these for me more than my grandson so I didn’t have to hear what he was playing !  Ha.  Actually they are made durable for a decent price and have a good warranty.  He loves them and so do I!!

I ordered two pairs of these headphones for my kids, very excited at all the features including a wire and noise control for young kids.From the start, we made sure the headphones were kept in good condition and put away when not in use. Around 6 months after buying them, the first blue pair cracked. It cracked where the headphones are supposed to extend, there is a thin piece of plastic that cracked very easily as my son was trying to make the headphones bigger. Thinking this was a fluke, I ordered a replacement pair.

*****UPDATE******EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE! After giving a 3 star review and writing the comment below, Patozon surprised me with a new pair of headphones in my mailbox today, and I checked my messages to find they had left one asking for details about the problem pair. Will definitely give them my business again! New headphones work like a charm!
These headphones work really well! They are also really comfortable so I highly recommend these

Let me just say, I have bought so many pairs of headphones for my two children! They are a little rough with them, and they end up broken within a month. I actually stopped buying them headphones because of this, but I decided to get them each a new pair for an upcoming trip. I liked this because it came with two sets of headphones, one was pink and one was blue, perfect for my boy and girl. They're pretty great, I love the sharing ability. The compatibility is not just for this brand of headphones either. When the headphones are just plugged in,  the sound is pretty quiet (which I like to protect my kids' ears) I have used their headphones as well, and the volume actually does go up pretty loud. What I like the best about these headphones is that after a few months they are still in great shape! I will definitely buy again.
Just got today. Feel very sturdy & work well. My daughter will love the color!

Bought these for my niece and they work great!! Love the sharing feature and she raves about how comfortable they are. It’s also nice that you can set the volume as well, so no worries about her listening to music too loud. The colors are her favorite colors as an added bonus.

We got these and an amazing fire tablet for our girls for long car rides but they ended being very useful during quarantine! I have a 2 and 4 year old and the fit both of their heads well and they used them properly. Super awesome price as well. I will be highly recommending these.
Very nice head phones for children. Very comfortable and nice sound quality. My 1yo used these but the 3&5yo liked them also.

UPDATE: While these were amazing at 1st use, I was just informed by my daughters teacher that the sound is only coming out of one headphone.Brought these for my daughter for school when they work on the Chromebooks. Asked her how they worked out for her on her 1st day of use and she said "good". Glad she likes because we have been through a few headphones that she complained about but these not one complaint which is a huge plus for me!!!!

I'd purchased a number of different headphones prior to these and they all lasted about 6 months before my son broke the audio cable, snapped the jack, sat on them or something of the like that killed the headphones. Also it was difficult finding some that were small and comfortable enough for a 7-10yo kids head but where the ear piece was large enough to cover their ear comfortably.These hit the spot in every way. They are not quite "over the ear" but they are pretty close and are soft enough that the kids can comfortably use them for longer periods (school, long car rides on their iPads etc..). The padded headband is great, again for the longer periods of use it's not applying pressure on the tops of their heads. The adjustable sides are easy to use & robust for kids. Sound quality I'm assuming is fine as the kids have not complained (haven't personally tested that myself).  Lastly they are robust - my son had a habit of walking away with them in the ipad and ripping the jack out, but these have lasted very well. The jacks are angled and reinforced, and the cable has put up with the abuse my son dishes out also (we've had the wire inside the cable break on multiple occasions on previous headphones I'd tried, but never on these).  They also fold up which is convenient for packing in a school or travel bag.

I bought two of these headphones in different colors for my 5yo son and I to use for online learning with my Mac Book. I love that they can plug into each other so that multiple people can listen through the same audio jack. There is a pause/play button on the mic, and when you press it while using a Mac Book, iTunes opens. I noticed that the volume is lower on the headphones that are not plugged directly into the audio jack on the computer. Also, the microphone only works on the headphone plugged directly into the audio jack. Now, after using them for 11 weeks, this light blue one is not functioning properly. First, I noticed that one speaker stopped working when plugged directly into the audio jack, and now there is no sound coming through the headphones when plugged into the other set of headphones. I really like the product but I am dismayed that it is malfunctioning so soon after purchase.

Update (12/19): I intended to update our review earlier this week with a positive turnaround, but we can't.. After our original review, the manufacturer sent us a replacement for FREE! Excellent customer service. It was actually a slightly different model because the cord was permanently connected, rather than removable as our first set, which we preferred because it wouldn't get loose and disrupt the sound. Unfortunately, the new set broke IN THE SAME SPOT, right at the expansion connection. I had been so hopeful. My son loved these, soft and comfortable, blocked noise (from us too!), but now both sets are useless. We attempted to duct tape with supports but it doesn't sit right. These headphones are just not for us.Original Review (9/19): We ordered this for our son. The volume control feature worked as advertised. The sound quality was great. We thought it was a great fit. However, the quality of the materials is poor -- the second time we adjusted the fit to his head, it snapped right at the expansion connection and is no longer useable because that side just dangles. We thought we found a great set but we're disappointed that it broke so soon.
Don’t buy this if you want some headphones that work to protect your kids ears. I had to return them. There are much better ones in Amazon that actually work.

Product was a gift for a child. Looked cute. I tested them with my iPhone when she didn't want to wear the headphones, 5 minutes after getting them out of the box.  One side only worked about 20% of the time, cutting in and out, like a short.  Super annoying, especially as a gift. Very disappointed with the quality.  Cannot recommend. Return window closed, cool.

I like that I can connect my apple ear phones so that I can listen in on my kindergartener’s virtual, school calls. Sound Quality is cool. Not sure if these claim to be noise canceling but I could hear my son talking from upstairs... but I do like how these “cup” the ears comfortably. So far no real complaints. They costed a bit more than I like to spend for kids’ headphones but other than that...no complaints. I’ll try to come back after she uses them a few more times.
When you don't want to listen to another episode of Shaun the Sheep, these come in really handy. Blue is his favorite color and he loves them! Quite durable, since they also double as fishing line...

We have bought several headsets the past couple years that don’t last very long. These appear better made and more sturdy, but time will tell. They fit our 6 yr old granddaughter well and they are comfortable, yet snug.  She said they block out the noise well.

A while back I ordered a different Mpow product (blutooth headset and mic combo) and was really happy with the quality and value. So when I saw these on my search for children earphones I gave them a try. They fit my 4yr old (pictured) and my 2 year old wonderfully. They sat down with their tablets and my husband and I enjoyed a solid hour of silence. No fidgeting. No adjusting. No fighting. I’m very happy with this purchase and confident they will help with the remote learning programs as school starts up again!

Exactly what I needed!  The ear pieces are not round, but more of an oval shape, so they completely cover my daughter's ears.  She was complaining that the first headphones we purchased didn't cover her ears and she could still hear too much around her during her time on the laptop.  She LOVED these immediately!  Cushy comfortable; cupped her ears, didn't  just sit on top of her ears; and she loves the pink color, her favorite.  She's happy, I'm happy!

My kids love these headphones. We used them for two recent flights and my son kept them on the whole time, with no complaints. Since they are volume limiting, I was worried that they might not be loud enough for a noisy flight, but they were. I also like the fact that when my kids are wearing them, other people can't hear what is coming out of the headphones. (I'm sure the passengers sitting next to my kids appreciated that too). We've only had them for a month and have taken them on two trips (4 flights), but I think they are going to last for awhile. They are very flexible, yet sturdy.

I gave it a 4 because we didn’t purchase it for quality sound so it wouldn’t be fair to rate the sound as it’s review. They were purchased as a gift for my niece who is very tiny despite her age. No earbuds or earphones fit her after buying dozens of different types/brands I came across this pair that fit toddlers and they are perfect. She loves them. With most schools being on-line I would recommend these for small grade schoolers. They are very comfortable for her.

Original review: I bought these headphones for my 6 year old son in Mid-March.  At first, we were very happy with the noise cancellation, sound quality and comfort features of the headphones.  We used them quite often for online school activities until recently.  However, they puttered out completely by the end of May without much warning.  I need quality headphones that last more than 2.5 months.Update:  The company contacted me after the review above and sent us a new pair of headphones.  I was shocked that they would replace a product after so long.  So far, so good!

I bought the headphones for remote learning for my kids. It is soft and adjustable. It does cancel out some noise and allows the kids to concentrate more on their teachers rather than getting distracted with their surroundings. It doesn’t cancel out all noise which is good because the kids can still hear me when I need to get their attention.  There are only 2 volume options to limit the decibels. You will still have to adjust the volume using the iPad. I also like that you can create a series and attach more headphones to each other to share sound contents.

My two little guys needed headphones for road trips and now remote learning. They love these so far. I love that volume control means they won’t get their ears blasted with sound and they love the fit and colors. So far they like wearing them around the house. My older one wears them some for games and my only challenge is getting his attention now. The microphone works well for remote learning for now. So far we are happy with them!

The main thing I want to mention is that when you connect these headphones they work best with the straight phone jack. When you use the L shaped phone jack to share the headphones the l-shape does not connect well. I'm using these for my kids distance learning and the headphones with the l-shape phone jack are constantly falling off. Also I wish the sound protection was a little bit better like the cartoon character ones you get from Walmart or Target, you like the paw patrol or the Spider-Man headphones, these I feel are still a little loud for their ears.

I bought these for my 4 year old to wear while he's playing his educational computer games, and they fit his little head perfectly.  He finds them comfy and I like the volume reduction control they come with.  The microphone works also, we used it for his class Zoom meeting and I also was able to plug my headphones into his to share the meeting sound.  They have a tough-looking cord, hopefully it will hold up to the abuse of my kids.

My son has very sparingly used these headphones and as of today, only one side works! He was so upset he wanted to throw them in the trash. Do not buy if you’d like your headphones to last. I don’t know how to contact the seller. But, I’m hoping we can remedy this situation! Maybe we just have a defective pair???

I bought two of these headsets, purple for my daughter and blue for my son. This headset with mic works great. My daughter loves the color and she uses for her e-learning classes. It is build sturdy with quality materials. The sound dB control is a good option and both of my kids already use the sharing function! The adjustable headband is very comfortable for hours.

My son love these headphones when we first got them. Unfortunately he fell asleep with them on and they haven’t worked since .  They are not broken on the outside at all .  They short out when you use them .******Update********

Customer care replaced my bad headset and newer on looks good for kids, they have low db switch to keep kids ear safe as well.  the price still seems bit expensive in my opinion but kids love vibrant colors

Wonderful headphones. I already shared the link with my best friend to buy for her son for virtual learning. We ordered these for our 8 year old and she loves them. They were supposed to be for virtual learning but she uses them for everything. They are so comfortable I found her just sitting there reading with them on with nothing playing through them because the noise cancelation is that good. Which is awesome for is with a screaming toddler on the loose. The design and structure of the headphones is very durable. It has a nice rope cord and an extra aux output for dual listening with is great for us of her and our middle daughter want to listen to 1 device together with their headphones on. The only issue I ran into was when placing my order I could only purchase 1 per customer.

We bought these for our 3 yr old boy.  He is a tiny battlebot and rough as can be on everything.  These have held up VERY well and the volume restraint works PERFECTLY.  He's tossed these and he takes them on/off himself and loves them.  It helps when we're riding in a vehicle to keep him occupied without all of us having to listen to Blippi!  Highly recommend and would repurchase!

These headphones are great. My girls can connect their headphones and listen to the same thing. Works great especially now that “school from home” is happening and I have a toddler that wants in on schoolwork. She can listen in to the books on YouTube or math homework or school games or whatever on the computer and think she’s doing it too! I just bought another set to have in reserve.

I ordered these for my 7 1/2 yr old Grand Son who is doing home school.  He loves them.  He said they fit great and are very comfortable.  He was also amazed at how well they block outside noises.  I was sitting right next to him and he was listening to a lesson and he said he could barely hear me while I was on the phone.  Would definitely recommend!!!!
I bought this for my son that is taking virtual classes. No complaints. He uses the headphones all day and love them! He can concentrate better without interruptions during his classes.

Got these for my average-sized 3 year old son. They fit him AND me, although I’m a little small. The sound quality is great, they’re super comfortable, and they worked totally fine on our long-haul flight (even with decibels controlled to 85). I checked the sound level several times on the flight and he was happy throughout. Honestly, they feel a lot like the Bose QCs I use professionally. I’m thinking about buying a pair for myself.

I bought these for my son to use at school. They arrived well packaged and were awesome quality when I took them out of the box. There is a padded area on the top that touches your head. The earphones are soft and comfy and cover the ears nicely. I got the red and black and the color is nice and true to the photo. The sound quality is really nice and other noises are blocked out. Great headphones for the price. Will be buying more.

Ordered two of these for kids to do their online school classes.  Kids have been using them for almost a month now and they work great.  I don't worry about damage to their ears with the sound control.  Classmates and teachers are able to hear them through the built-in microphone.  This parent is really appreciative of the quality product; one less headache with schooling from home!

It worked well for awhile... but after a month, the microphone stopped working, which is unfortunate, since we purchased these so that my son could use them while doing remote piano lessons during the Covid stay at home order.

My 5 year old son loves these headphones! He needed them for his virtual learning for school, but they also come in handy when he's on his tablet and I'm trying to enjoy some quiet time. They are lightweight, comfortable, have a microphone, volume control and come in really cool colors. The price is great compared to some other kids headphones I've seen around. Plus, if he breaks them I can easily replace them and won't feel like I've broken the bank.

Update: Customer service contacted me regarding my review. They sent me a a brand new pair of headphones and so far so good! They said they were covered under a 2 year warranty! I am very pleased with their response and hopefully it was just a defect in the original headphones and these will last longer! Changing my rating to 4 stars!My 11 year old son received these for Christmas, one month later they are broken. He uses them for playing on the PlayStation and within one month the cord came completely detached at the volume control switch. I expected them to last longer than a month and was hopeful since they had such great reviews.

The earpieces are cushioned beautifully and have some sort of rocker mechanism behind them allowing them to contour comfortably around different shapes faces, including my three kids (9, 7, 4). My son who wears glasses was so excited that these didn't apply pressure to the his ears and dont interfere with his eyeglasses. Just purchased so I havent tried noise cancellation or durability yet.

This work really well for my 5 year old. I love how the cord is a braided material!I plugged them into multiple devices, laptop, kindle tablet, Samsung phone, to see if they got too loud for his ears. Do they get loud? Yes, but not too loud for my child's ears. I wouldn't worry if he listened to something for a while on loud. The quietest device was his kindle tab.. Which he would be on the most with these. I will be buying a 2nd set for my 3 year old.

Bought 2 for online learning, so we needed them fast.  I figured with all of the good reviews that they would be good quality, but seeing as though they add a card in the box to have you put in a good review for a free gift card I'm not so surprised.On the first pair the multifunction button disabled the noise cancelling switch but only if you held down the button.  The sound was too quiet for my child but when we tried to raise the volume on the PC the noise in the headphones was very crackly.

Really impressed with the quality of these headphones for the price. The cord is soft and flexible, ear pieces and headset top are comfy with the cushions, and the sound is great. Probably too small for some adults but perfect for kids. Easy video sessions with the built in microphone. Very happy with this purchase.

These were purchased as an accessory to my daughters Kindle fire.  We’ve had them for about three months and they were working great until tonight when she took them off and the plastic broke on the right side. I really hope that the company will replace these ones for another set. My daughter loved them and now she is without. So I can only give 2 stars as of now until I can rate the customer service we received if the company can replace.

Update!: After seeing this review the company contacted me, sent me a replacement pair, and it has yet to break. Great customer service and it appears I just got a weak pair of headphones the first time. Satisfied now!We have only had these for a very short period of time and already they are broken! At first I loved them and recommended them to many because I love how you can connect two into each other, but for being kid headphones, I would expect them to be built a little sturdier than this... hopefully the other set doesn’t break too and this one was just a dud :(

Bought these for my kindergartner as headphones were on his school supplies list due to the times we are in. He started using them at home as I have a newborn & he doesn't like to hear him cry. I sent the headphones to school & next day I get a text from his teacher that he is demanding to have his headphones back to take home lol!! So I'm purchasing a second pair! So coming from a 5yr old the nose cancelation & sound quality/volume are great!! Plus he hasn't destroyed the cord & volume control on the cord like he has done with previous other brand headphones. Thanks!

These headsets are top quality and love the fact that they fold! My son is able to hear real well in the noisy car with them and the volume switch which increases the sound slightly (and enough to make a difference) when in noisier conditions is perfect!  The earmuffs fit perfectly over his ears making the noise cancellation very effective.  Very happy with this product!

My daughter loves these. The volume control on the cord is very useful, but we have had issues of her having to volume so loud she couldn't hear us trying to get her attention. One pair has been broken from being stepped on, so definitely recommend that other parents ensure their kids learn about caring for them.

I bought two pairs of these, one for each of my daughters (4 and 6). We had tried other children’s headphones, but they were too large for their little heads. These fit perfectly because if the cushion on the band that goes over their head. We also really loved the ability to connect them to each other when the girls wanted to watch the same thing.

Initially, we thought these headphones were great. Our little one Initially, them and used them a lot. However, after using them for a few months the headphones just stopped working. We didn't even have them q full year and they weren't used on q daily basis. This was very frustrating since they were exactly what we were looking for. For that reason, we don't recommend them for long term use.

Bought these for distance learning on Zoom for my 6 yo, so she could focus better on her teacher since her desk is set up in our living room. We love it because of the headphone output plug on one of the ears. When she needs to wear the headphones to focus, but we want to still hear what's going on, we plug a speaker in to listen in. She loves these!

**Update - was contacted by seller within days after review posted.  Exchanged emails to describe problem and received a brand new headphone a couple days later.  So far so good on headphones but may be super early to tell.  Just wonderful customer service from this seller.Overall these are gold headphones but this the second pair we got and within a month the ear foam has come off and can’t be out back on easily or permanently. Had other headphones for over 2 years that this never happened to. Disappointed and won’t buy again.
These work great for my kids ranging in age from 6-12. I've even borrowed them myself for a couple of work meetings.We used for online schooling and for listening to audio books in the car.

Our kids love these headphones. Unlike some other volume limited headphones, these have enough volume that the kids don't mind using them. We've had others that you could barely hear anything through them. They also enjoy being able to link the headphones up together so they can all listen to the same thing at the same time. Certainly helps keep the noise level down in the house since the kids will actually use these headphones.

This is our second pair of these headphones. A friend bought us our first pair to replace a broken set of a cheaper brand. These are such better quality. My 2 (now 3) year old wears them for noise cancelling headphones all the time. I assume they must be comfortable. My 6 year old wears them when listening to music and watching dvd's in the vehicle. I like that we can connect the headphones together when they are watching the dvd player and that they fold for storage. They've held up to the abuse a 2 & 6 year old have put them through for many months.

Good headphones for children, they're not too tight and don't hurt their heads. They also are comfortable and soft. Good volume limiter, enough to hear but not enough to hurt their ears. My first pair broke on top then one side went off but got in touch with the seller and they replaced at no charge to me.

I bought these headphones for my son's 8th birthday. I anticipate more e-learning in the 2020-2021 academic year and I wanted to get my son a pair of good headphones to use for his school's video lessons and hangouts. So far he likes them, the sound is good, the volume control is good, the cord doesn't tangle, and the microphone works. I will update my review if anything unusual happens to them as they get used regularly.

EDIT: below you'll see my original review with one star. I had thought it was too late to return these since my daughter didn't tell me for a couple months. This company's saw my review and without me asking or anything just sent me a brand new pair that works fine. I will say the customer service is phenomenal and I have changed my review to five stars for that alone. Due to their prompt response and initiative I would guess that their product is always of good quality and I just got a one-off oddball.These broke in 2 days. Just stopped working. Unfortunately my daughter didn't tell me for 6 weeks (she thought it would make me sad?)...

I have bought these several times--not because they break, but because they "disappear".  Daughter loves the ability to share listening with a friend.  Noise cancelling is so good my daughter usually doesn't hear me talking to her unless she see's my lips moving.  Adults in our house use these too but are a tad smallish for an adult--we don't care

These are great headphones, and they fit my 4/5 year old comfortably and well. However, as most children (boys especially) are not the gentlest handlers of objects, he has gone through 3 pairs. At least they're cheap but I guess that's why they fell apart so easily. He slams them down on the desk or couch and the top comes apart to the point of exposing the wires and eventually not working anymore. If you are looking for a better investment move on from these. Otherwise they're good for a few months at a time.

I wanted to order my son a pair of headphones for school and am so happy I found these!I appreciate that there's a noise cancellation option so that he can really concentrate and not get interrupted by outside noises.
I ordered these for both my kids (8 and 10).The headset itself adjusts to appropriate sizes for kids....which is great and different than a lot of other brands.

The headphones are sturdy and the sound quality is fine but I bought two of these for my kids for video calls for school and both of them have the same problem. When they unmute themselves, the mic still doesn't work until they unplug the headphones completely. We've tried all the buttons on the wire control but if they want to speak to their class, they have to unplug the headphones.

Sounds perfect! My daughter's like the option of being able to share music, and what not, via the 3.5mm interface. The volume control option is a great addition to the headphones and very useful when playing games with my PS4. I will buy one more for my wife.

Love these kid-size headphones. Took them on an airplane, and they worked great! Haven't tried hooking to another set yet, but can't wait to try that!Update: Raised to 5 stars. I tried these on compared to another pair of kids headphones, and these ones really suctioned nicely over the ears. Super comfortable and stay sized properly (no slipping or gradually getting bigger the longer they are on). Highly recommend these!!

The loudest volume when the limit switch was on was the same as when it was off - too loud for a little one's ears. I do like that the cord can be removed so the youngest can wear them without listening to anything - just pretending - and I don't have to worry about the cord getting in the way.
The microphone doesn’t work. I purchased these for my son to use in a homeschool setting for online meetings with his teacher and they are useless.

I bought these for my grandchildren. One a boy and a girl, so these were perfect for them. My granddaughter loved the pandas. Now I can listen to the TV while they play on their kindles.  So far they have held up very well. My grandson is not one to take care of things, but he is only 4yrs old, so he is learning. I keep them at my house for them to use so that they do not loose them.

I bought the Cerulean and light blue combination for one of my kids and he LOVED it! Since I am working from home during the pandemic these headphones blocked out ALL the noise that my child previously complained about when trying to work by using the loud/quiet switch on the control panel. As for the sound quality, it was crystal clear(It sounded like I wasn't even wearing headphones) and blocked out any background noise. In addition, the headset was EXTREMELY comfortable. Finally, the mini  control panel on the cord was super useful when we were watching a movie together, one person could pause/un-pause videos/take/receive calls, just with a few pushes of a button.  The only drawback was that my son felt that even when the headphones were opened to their largest setting, they barely fit him and may not fit him in the years to come. To conclude, the headset did everything that its packaging said it would. I would without doubt buy this for my other child.P.S. The pause/ start button DOES NOT work for youtube on a mac. I'm still not sure about other devices, but it does work for the iTunes application.

I bought these for my 8 year-old daughter. She’s very happy with them for long days of wearing them for virtual classes at home during the coronavirus. She finds them to be very comfortable. We tried the LilGadgets Connect+ PRO, too. She found those to sound a bit better but after a while of wearing them her ear lobes hurt. She has not said the same of these MPOWs after several days. My 4 year-old son also thought the MPOWs were more comfortable.My one issue with these and the LilGadgets is that the sound wasn’t as good in the non-wired ear. Wiggling the wire improved the sound at times. We returned them both, got another pair of the MPOWs, and so far so good. There seems to be a wiring issue in some of them. But because Amazon’s return and replace is so easy, we got the new pair pretty quickly, when we really needed them. Fingers crossed the wiring is okay. I’d give them five stars without the wiring issue, but since others have run into this, it’s clearly a thing people need to know about.

We’ve tried a lot of headphones up in these parts. Too many of them mysteriously stop working within a month of receipt. I suspect it is mostly do to a poor job connecting the wires to the sound jack. In any case, these headphones do an awesome job of cancelling sound and limiting volume. They are soft on my kids’ ears and come in enough colors to make almost any choosy kid happy. Order arrived quickly and exactly as described. I chose these MPow headphones based on their volume limiting capabilities and am pleased with the quality thus far.

We've had these headphones for a month and have used them with normal use going into week two of virtual school. My daughter is hearing static feedback and the volume keeps fluctuating. Her teacher could hear her at first now they can't hear her either with the headphones in. I've checked everything and can't tell what the problem is. Of course this all happened one week past the returnable date!

I have tried several headphones for my son but they were always too big for him and kept slipping off.  I was delighted when I found these Mpow's! I read a bunch of reviews and everyone seemed to love them and now I know why.  They are well built, fit him perfectly and love the ability to limit the sound so he doesn't make it too loud. I also LOVE that you can plug another pair of any type of headphones into the one ear and both share the sound.  Perfect for watching movies on his iPad together.  Also great that it has a mic built in as he will be using these for his Google Meetings for online school this year.  Bravo Mpow!

These headphones work well and my son has said he can’t hear me when he has them on, so the noise cancelling abilities must work well. The only concern I have is about the chord staying into the actual ear part of the head phone. If it’s tugged at all, it has some give. Hence the 4 stars instead of 5.

I ordered two pairs for two of my kids for virtual schooling. One pair works fine. The other the teacher is unable to hear my daughter speaking. It is not a chromebook issue, it seems to be the headphones themselves. Both kids find them comfortable. It is hard to have tech issues with a 6yr old because they don't always let you know something is amiss.

It is comfortable and looks cool and my son really loved it. But the sound started getting choppy soon after it was received.  It is filtering out voices if there is any sort of music in the background. If you twist the audio jack around sometimes a word or two will filter in. So hopefully it can still be used for its intended purpose (schooling and teacher meetings) but it is worthless to listen to music or videos.

I purchased two sets for my toddlers (4yo & 5yo) for a long road trip. They seem really comfortable.  Love the fact that it's adjustable so they can grow into them, they seem to be noise cancelling, and the maximum volume allowed is controlled for little ears.  I love the fact that it has a pause/play button, also.  Great buy.

I have other MPow products, which is why I bought these for my son (age 6, 1st grade) .My son uses them for distance learning. I haven't had the chance to use them myself... However the build quality seems great, like my other MPow stuff... And my 6yo son says they're very comfortable.

We're gearing up for distance learning (cue crying), and the school said that headphones would make the video calls very helpful so we ordered these. My 4 year old loves the color and was thrilled to listen to music on them. She loved that she and her sister could listen to something at the same time, so they had a dance party together.

Great headphones especially for the price! I bought these for my son to use on his Teams meetings for remote learning.  It had to have a mic and be cushioned.  These are super cushioned and comfortable.  They are big enough for my 8 year old and can get small enough for my 5 year old.  Only thing I'd like to have seen is a true volume control with a slider,  but there is a decibal control and on/ off for sound output on the cord which is nice.  Overall,  great purchase! Will be looking for a girls' style for my daughter!

Got this for my kindergartener to use during remote learning. They're comfortable for him, the microphone works well, the cord seems nice and durable, and they can get loud enough for him with no problem. Bonus for coming in Seahawks colors - we aren't football fans, but they're popular with the other kids!

Perfect fit for my 3yr old. They seem comfortable and not too loud for little ears. I went with the corded version to save money but if I had the choice again, I'd go cordless. The cord gets twisted, my son pulls it out by mistake or it detaches when the device falls and it's a pain to keep plugging back in. Just a personal preference. Other than that, a great buy for the price.

The volume control is great as video, music and media sources are mixed at higher volume than ever - a deliberate choice to make an impact and engage the consumer. These allow parents to control that and volume limit is at 85 dB with a max of 94 dB. Great for general audio and music, online learning applications. Also - if you have more than one child using these, you can connect the headphones together so they can quietly listen to the same source. That is fantastic. Simple, older feature - few headphones support that these days. These really are designed for kids and smaller heads, if you are an adult with a smaller frame or head it might work, otherwise get an adult sized headset.

We have ordered 2 pair of these headphones (Blue and lilac). They are very nice looking and feel like good quality. The kids (1.5 and 6 years old) can put them on/off by themselves and they seem comfortable.I had to give 4 stars instead of 5 because 1 set has stopped working after about a year, but I think MPOW is sending me another set under warranty. Overall great purchase for the price and super stylish.

These headphones have helped a lot now that we are doing virtual learning.The background noise that she can hear is minimal when wearing them and I love the fact that there is a max volume for the headphones.  Hoping they hold up well when toting them back and forth to day care.

We used them for an airplane ride with my 3.5 year old and 18 mo old. Three year old wore them for an entire movie without complaining once. 18 mo old did periodically pull them off when they started slipping (little big for him), but overall did much better than I expected him to do with headphones. I know some reviews complained about volume not being loud enough with airplane noise, but we didn't have that problem. It was plenty loud for the two of them and I could hear fine when I tested volume during airplane. However, my kids are little so they aren't exactly watching dialogue heavy shows :). Loved that the one set plugged right into the other set of headphones so we didn't need a headphone splitter. I just sat them together on one airplane seat, sharing the iPad together--- I'm not saying the airplane ride was a breeze, but that at least kept them entertained for a while. Definitely recommend. We will be taking them on all of our future airplane rides.
The cord was already torn from where it was tied up with the tie when we opened it today. Completely disappointed.

I bought 2 of these for my kids to use at their school’s computer lab. Schools closed down because of covid and they were kept there until this past August. My kids have been using them for remote learning and I noticed that the cables are not very durable. Both earphones have the exact same issue. The cords started to get twisted and tangled. In consequence the cloth that covers the cords have ripped in different areas, and now the cords are bent and broken. I know they were cheap, but I was expecting a better quality.

I purchased these two weeks ago for my kids to use for online classes. So far so good. I love the decibel/volume control. If you're looking for something with bass and all that forget it. I compared with my husband's headphones and there's just no comparison.... want something basic, comfortable and protects the little ears....get this!

This is the 2nd pair of these i have purchased. I purchased these for my son for school. The first pair broke but it had nothing to do with the quality of the headphones. Had to do with a 8 year old getting a little wild. The fit is great. The're very comfortable with soft cushions. Should last my son the school year and then some.
They are sturdy, comfortable, and adorable. My 4 y/o loves them. Sound is very clear.

These headphones worked perfect for the first few weeks but soon after that sound started breaking, echoing. Something went wrong even with mouthpiece, sound stopped going. It has become a big trouble I will have to buy new headphones for my son because these are of no use now. His online classes are becoming frustating because of these headphones. No use. After reading the old reviews I had thought it will be a good product but its not.Edited: The customer service is awesome. 1 week after this review they sent me new pair in mail. Thank you so much. The new one is working great as of now.

I got this for virtual school. It works well with my child's Chromebook-both the headphones and the microphone. I'm having trouble using it with my other kid and an old MacBook--the headphones work, but the microphone doesn't work. I don't fault the headphones, that computer just needs a USB connector. The price is great, they seem comfortable, and my kids like them. Just make sure you know what will work with your machine!

I'm so amazed at the quality and sound of these headphones! I got them for my grand-daughter because ear buds hurt her ears and are hard to put on her. They seem to be quite well built. And they fold up for easy portability. You can't beat the price! Delivered the next day with Amazon Prime.

Worked well for a few months then the audio began cutting out before they quit working altogether. My son likes the style and fit of these so we ordered a new pair. Hopefully the new ones make it longer than the last ones. These are headphones that are used at school, so I have no knowledge of how they are treated there. Giving the headphones the benefit of the doubt with the 3 star rating.

My kids love these (4 &7).  They initially had the kids gear headphones.  My son would complain that they hurt his ears and would always take off his glasses when wearing them.  I'm so glad I replaced them with these,  they are comfy,  fit over the ears, and the cord has the knit protective cover around it.

This is a nice inexpensive set of headphones for a little kid. They're not exceptionally durable-feeling, but at this price point I'm happy with the quality. They fit well on my toddler. She's not really around anyone who uses headphones, so I've had to put them on now and then to show her it's normal. The color is great. I'm very happy with them.

Bought this for my 2 year old as we will be going on vacation and he will need headphones for his tablet and he loves it. the cord is durable so far as my son has bit it multiple times and they still work. My only complaint is i wish they were alittle slimmer. My son has a big head and these barely fit on his head while he is in his car seat. Other then that they are great!

My kid loves it and said it is very comfortable to use. I got it for her to use for extended periods what with having to do online schooling due to the situation with the pandemic currently. She likes it and for its price, definitely worth it. Will probably buy another one when one of the other colors go on sale, hopefully.

These are perfect for toddlers! The cord is a material that won't fray or stretch like the classic rubber you find on most head phone cords. There's plenty of cushion over the ears and head piece for comfort. The blue colors are fun and inviting, which makes my toddler excited to wear it!

My little one (age 5) seems the like the headphones. They are large enough to cover his ears without bothering him or applying too much pressure. They noise canceling must work well because when I attempted to speak to him, he certainly acted like ge couldn't hear me! Maybe that was him ignoring me? Lol. The headphones appear to be a great quality and I would definitely recommend to others.
Bought it for a long air trip with my 3 years old. She absolutely loves it and refused to take off. It feels very comfortable. The sound quality is not very good though but guess kids don’t care

I bought these in Jan for my daughter for her new school that she transferred to. She used them at school until beginning of March when schools shut down due to COVID, in May I picked them up from her school since they never resumed for the year. She began using them at home and one day the cords literally just pulled out from the sound adjustment on the cord. Very disappointed in the quality. They were great, but would expect a little higher quality when it comes to kids. My daughter is 8 and takes care of her items so I'm a little at a loss.

Nice-looking, comfortable  headphones for our kids to use at school and on zoom at home. However, one of them broke after about 9 months of use. Of course it was handled by kids so adult handling would probably allow the product to last longer. But it is a kids product.

My kid loves the color and fit!  Out of the box these seem like good quality especially compared to other headphones aimed at kids.  The size adjustments are smooth and secure so I don’t think these will fall off easily. I also appreciate the inclusion of a switch for the volume limiting function in case a grown up wants to use them at normal levels.  Sound quality itself is pretty good with good bass and enough noise reduction from the ear pads to discourage cranking up the volume in the first place.  A nice bonus feature is the inclusion of an extra output jack so you can share with a second set. These paired with the upgraded Roku remote are perfect.

Very basic headphones. There’s a switch for volume control of 94DB or alternatively, 84DB. The headphones aren’t noise canceling for me, but I’m an adult. My kids like them. I think they’re great for what they are and work well for distance learning.

Raised to 5 🌟.  After posting my comments below I was sent a new item.  Warranty and customer service is pretty good.Was perfect for a few months then it stopped working so I am knocking it down a couple stars.

The volume control is great, loud enough so my kids can still hear the music/movie over the car noises but not too loud to hurt their ears. Very soft ear foam with thick durable material. They fit my 18 month old - my 6 year old with no issues and very easy to adjust.
I got these for my son to use with our iPad on a road trip. They are the perfect size and I’m very happy with them!

These are perfect for my little guy.  He chewed the cord of his last pair (not this brand) so one of the ears stopped working.  The cord is not plastic material- it’s soft (I don’t know the material) like a thick cloth so I don’t foresee him breaking these if he does chew them

We’ve bought several pair of these headphones and will keep coming back for more (my kids are HARD on headphones and them breaking is no fault of the headphones). The kids like being able to connect to each other’s headphones to share the sound on the rare moments they are getting along and want to share.

Good quality, perfect size for my kids 5 and 7 years old,  they love it and the fact that they can share a video using this headphones is really great. They used another brand and they complained about ears size comfort but with this new pair no more complaints.
We bought these for our 3 year old. They’re perfect in size, fit and comfort.He used them for his kindle when we drive long periods of time.

My son likes his new headphones and they work well with his iPad for online school. They don't press so hard on his ears, which is important because he wears glasses and has had trouble with other headphones being too tight and pressing in his earpieces. Thumbs up from us!

My kids loved them right away, I ordered 3 (pink, vlue and black/red), and that shared feature was amazing that they could share the ipad the 3 of them only with one headphone jack. Sound limiter also worked well and music quality top notch... Amazing Bang for Buck.
I purchased these as a school supply list item. Just received notification from my kids teacher that they aren’t working. ☹️Purchased in August 14- today is October 3 and already not working.

Bought 3 pairs of these for our kiddos, for school. They’re really comfortable on their ears and they love the fact that they can plug into each other’s headphones to listen to the same thing.The noise-cancelling feature is very good, as soon as you put them on you can barely hear any external sounds/noises, which prevents you from needing to turn the volume up to unhealthy levels.

My kids have used these for only a few weeks of distance learning and the microphones on both headsets I ordered have stopped working. Their teachers say that they cut in and out and are super glitchy. It’s not the computer or the internet because they are able to hear them fine with different headsets. It’s very frustrating because they stopped working right after the return window closed.

Just realized I have an iPhone 8+ so I can’t even test these out 🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️ I have to wait for the actual tablet to get here... I’ll update... they’re cute and easily folds so yea, reviews check out so far👍🏾

I have been trying to find headphones with a mic for a long time.  My girl needed a pair for schooling from home started.  She says these headphones work very well and she loves the color.  Looking forward to seeing how they do with use from a 6-year-old.

I really wanted to love these but they’ve been nothing but problematic. I purchased them for my second grader to use for her online classes, and they are constantly creating issues by pulling up Siri, muting her without the ability to resolve, dropping sound, pausing videos, and so on. We’ve used them with both her Chromebook and our iPad and each had nearly the same issues. Super frustrating to have constant disruption during what should be a time to focus on her schoolwork.

I bought these for my kid who has to take her classes online. So far we are very happy and my kid loves them. She can listen to her teachers and do her home-work without disruptions from all the other noises around her. She also loves to listen to music with these and we all don't have to hear it.

My son needed headphones for his computer at school, and I didn’t want to pay a lot of money for something that he could potentially lose at school. I kept buying cheap headphones at the store and they broke ridiculously fast, so I caved and searched Amazon for something else. I liked these because they’re not too expensive and they come in lots of colors. They have exceeded my expectations. They have already lasted months and he likes them so much he brings them home and uses them here as well. When my other son said he needed headphones I immediately ordered another set in a different color and he loves them as well. Definitely recommend.

My 4 year old daughter is doing online classes and these are working great! I am actually ordering a second pair for my 3 year old son so he can listen as well. I love the splitter feature idea so I’m hoping that works as good as it should! The fit is great and can be easily adjusted and they do not hurt my daughters ears, they are soft and comfy.

My kids often end up sharing one device because they're interested in what the other is doing, but I never have that little dual output thing to plug into the device so they can share the sound with headphones.
