I love that these are padded and have the ability to plug another headphone directly into this set - it won't be a problem to share again!

These are pretty decent for the price. He's already tossed them across the room (by accident) and they still work fine. They will not work on his Xbox though...and that was the purpose of the purchase.

Really nice and great quality out of the box. Having the option for microphone helps the kids communicate quietly with each other during classroom discussions and noise canceling helps me be able to listen to lessons while they're working without it interrupting them. These are great!

Ordered a pair for my 5 year old daughter for online distance learning and my 3 year old son loved them so much I just ordered a second pair for him. They are durable and have a mic. Finally I don't have to tell them to turn their tablets down over and over again.

We got these for distance learning for 3 kids in the same room.  Very comfortable for over the ear design.  Fits my 12, 10, and 8 year olds  just fine.  Compact design stores conveniently.  I am concerned due to plastic construction, but so far, so good.  Sound is pretty good.  Volume control is controlled on the computer with exception of 94 to 85 dB slide switch.  Microphone seems to work just fine.  Overall this is a very good value and the kids know their color due to the diverse color selection so there's no fighting over whose is whose.  Amazon delivery took about a week for the FREE delivery.

Got these for my 6 year old daughter for school and she loves them. I tried them out just to listen to the setting for the volume and it was very nice. I am glad I did so much searching for the right headset and found it. Worth every penny!

I bought this for my son who had a pair of headphones that had flat foam over the ears. These are recessed so his ears are more comfortable to use for a long period of time. The built in mic is a plus that’s a necessity to use during virtual classes. He loves it!

I initially thought these were a great value but then the cord started breaking through all over. My son just sits on the couch with them and his last pair never had this issue. He doesn’t twist them or anything. I’ve had them since Jan 30 and today, 3/12 he told me sound was only coming out of one side. After a thorough look over I cannot find what the issue is. I’m glad I didn’t oay a lot for these

Because of school being remote this year, I really wanted to get my kids a good pair of headphones for each of them. I ordered these ones for my 5 year old daughter and she loves them! They fit her perfectly and shes pretty small for a 5 year old! Seriously! Some 3 year olds are bigger then her!! lol The color of these headphones is really nice too! she picked out the blue ones! I love that they have the option to adjust the sound quality/noise cancellation. They also come with a warranty which is great, so I'm looking forward to (hopefully) a better fall then we had spring with home learning!

Kids are headed back to school and are hybrid. We needed something that was much more obvious that they were plugged in and listening. We selected these as we wanted something that was wired and the bright so we can see they have them on. The sound seems to work well for the kids and they were compatible with the mac and pc devices.

My 4.5 year old almost immediately pinched his hand in these when folding them up. He couldn’t get his hand out and was hysterical. I tested it myself and got a very painful pinch. I don’t care about sound quality if it’s that easy to get hurt on these junky headphones.

I have been a loyal MPOW customer since I first tried their lower end bluetooth headsets. Because of that and a recommendation from one of the podcasts that I listen to (Destination Linux) I tried these out.The sound quality is great and the music sharing feature is awesome. You can literally plug these headsets into each other so that they can all watch or listen to the same thing together with a single connection from the device.

These headphones are super cute, sturdy and have good sound quality. My daughter needed headphones with a microphone for her Zoom calls with her class due to Covid 19. She likes these very much and appreciates the volume control.

Works great for 11 year old for a tablet. I live that it is made out of cord instead of plastic. Fold up real good. This is actually the second one I have bought the first ones only broke because it was stept on but I did tape it and it still works.

I bought these for my 7 year old. He loves that they fold up and the volume control button on the cord. It has been hard to find headphones that are comfortable and stay snug in his head. We also love the sound share option which was a surprise! My 5 year old walked in the room and is now begging for a pair of his own. We love these headphones

My grandson is in 2nd grade this year.  We just got them today and he couldn't wait to try them.  He loves them and said they are very soft on his ears and they stay on really good.  He is still wearing them with his tablet.

So I love these headphones. Great sound and they fold up so that it’s a plus when traveling. I’m still trying to understand the the switch when I flip it up it sounds great like surround sound, the button doesn’t work for starting music though

Got these for my sons' distance learning setup since they sit next to each other for classes. They are great!! They've held up well against two 4 year olds using them and are cute to boot. Highly recommend - very good value.

Returning headphones, if you are just listening to voice it’s fine, add any music and they are totally glitching.Update: the company sent me a replacement pair of headphones free of charge. This pair worked perfectly. My daughter with sensitive ears is very pleased. I’m impressed with their customer service.

Just got these, but they work great on Chromebook and tablet (last pair made tablet go haywire, turning volume up and down and summoning the Assistant, but this one doesn't). Kid says they're comfortable, he "feels like a YouTuber," we're satisfied.

These are wonderful headphones for a child or small adult!  We needed one that would fit over a child's BTE hearing aide and these fit the bill. They just fit over it and haven't caused feedback.  They are nicely cushioned, have great fabric covered wire (even on the inside where they fold up) and feel sturdy.

Like the ability to limit maximum volume as my kid will be using lots of screen time with the current situation. The curve of the headset fits my kiddo's head. Also, there is a extra slot to share headset, a friendly parental control tool :)

No real volume control. Sound quality is ok but can be wonky a occasionally, I have figured it was school lent Chromebook that was causing the issue. I can hear things still so the noise canceling isn’t really working. I haven’t tried the connection feature but that is because I bought on pair. They fit my kid nicely and adjust to fit myself. I actually would buy again because they are very looking and held up though out quarantine school.

I purchased blue for my 3 yo son and pink for my 8 yo daughter and they love their new headphones. No more arguing over devices because they can both share and listen in and it helps being that I work from home. I like how you can adjust the sound as well. Great buy/highly recommended.

My daughter loves these headphones. Unfortunately, we got a puppy and she found them on the floor. The cord was a perfect chew toy. So, we are on our second pair. Now the cord is covered in nylon and is fused to the headphones now. You used to be able to take the whole cord off. I like that you can connect them together, too. Great headphones for kids!

I bought these for my 2 1/2 year old for a flight. We have gone yet but he loves them. I like that they fold up and that the cord isn't plastic that could break. I tried on the headphones myself and they're pretty comfortable. I'll update this review if my thoughts change after our family trip.

I got these headphones for remote learning for my 7 year old. They are both cute and comfortable! And best of all, my other kids can’t hear distracting noise coming from the headphones while she is working! We loved them so much, we purchased a second color for my son. And I didn’t realize until after I bought them that you can link the headphones together so you can hear out of one headphone jack!

Great headphones! I was looking for a cheaper pair for my 10 year old seeing he goes through a couple pairs a year. These are amazing for the price. The sound is great and he says they’re very comfortable. Microphone works well too. So happy I found these!

These headphones are really great for the price, I've purchased 3 MPOW products and they all work really well, and are sturdy. These headsets can connect to each other and share the audio feed from a device which is really nice.

Ordered as a replacement for other headphones that the kids broke. These are much more comfortable on their ears, fold down nicely for storage and have a built-in audio jack so that you can have multiple headphones listening to the same device without needing a separate splitter, which we have found handy for car rides. Highly recommended.

So far after about two weeks of use the headphones will get the job done.  Ive bought other headphones and they've broken within a week or so, but these are holding up great.  The noise cancellation has been phenomenal, even to the point my kids don't hear me calling there name in the same room.  The only down side is, Ive had to come and recheck the connection to the computer at times, it can slip out easily and my kids complain they cannot hear.  I'd definitely buy them again.....

Perfect for my young kids, I tested the loudness and it does go loud, but not incredibly loud where you’d have to worry about their ears/hearing. My son can attest to their noise canceling when I call him and he can’t hear me haha.

Tween says they are, "very comfy" and it's "Five stars all around!". The color choices are nice. Works very well. Bought the headset for distabce learning on a Chromebook. It also works on XBOX One controllers and Dragon Touch tablet. Bought one in another color for the youngest for distance learning. My children's entropic nature hasn't destroyed them yet and that's a win in my book. Still bought the warranty just in case.

They're nice looking and feel good, and they're volume limiting like I wanted. The sound quality is lacking when compared to what I would buy for myself, but I think that's pretty much expected at this price point and I imagine the volume limiting plays a part too. My young daughter is happy with them.

We ordered 2 sets of these for our kids for school. They are great! When opening the box you will see right away one of our favorite components, these are collapsible...which is great for storage! Bug bonus in our book. Sound and volume is great, as well as being super comfy. Worth the purchase!

My 5 year old loves these headphones. They fit his head perfectly,  nicely cushioned. The cable very resistant with a fabic meses coating, perfect since my little one likes to chew on the cable when he uses headphones. We love that you can hookup another set of headphones to his, so 2 people can listen at the same time. Sound is great,  microphone works perfectly.

This headphone is different from other brand (we purchased different brands for the kids before, those were cheaply made and broke in couple days). Mpow CH6S is much more comfortable, foldable, and adjustable. The kids love the headphone and wear it all the time. The sound quality also sounds great, which just fit my kid needs.

Wrong model number CH6s----------Product Describe model no. CH6. But the seller send model number CH6S. So this model you cannot remove the audio cable from headphone! But in model CH6 you can remove.

My five-year-old loves them...from the color options (she picked her favorite) to the softness of headphones (perfect for not hurting a young child's sensitive head) to the quality of sound, these headphones are a bargain at the price. The conveniently located microphone has helped her to be better heard by the teacher, and the headphones make sure that she gets quality sound from Zoom, YouTube, and the other resources used without allowing it to ever get too loud for her. She loves them, and they have definitely upped our game while we have to school from home...

Bought for my granddaughter.  She loves them.  Very comfortable - nicely padded.  I bought due to the new online school experience starting this fall.  They seem to cancel most of the background noise for her.  Good product for a good price.

I ordered these headphones for my 5yo to begin remote learning for Kindergarten these past weeks. So far we have found them to be exceptional. Excellent quality & comfort. The extended 2 yr warranty is an added plus!

These headphones were perfect for my kiddos. They loved that they could watch a movie together or on their own with ease. They were the perfect size for their heads and comfortable. They are durable and well made. We had a problem with the first set and the company was quick to send another pair right alway. Very pleased!

Works fine for what we need. Got them originally for online school during the pandemic and also long car rides. Only bad this is that they are almost too small for my 5 year old but he likes them. He will grow out if them fast but as long as he takes care of them it will go to his younger brother 🤞

My daughters second pair we love them and seller is a pleasure to work with. Only reason I gave 4 stars was the first pair cracked after only a couple months but seller quickly fixed the problem. I would defiantly buy again.

got these for my son, he loves the volume control button and being able to have a split headphone jack when he's watching movies in the car on one screen so he and his brother can watch the same thing and listen together

Got these for my daughter to use for her Distance Learning for this school year. The colors are exactly as shown and they don't feel cheap at all. The cord is nice and strong and the headset is adjustable. I wish there was a bit more volume control for them, but that can mostly be controlled from the laptop anyways

Bought them for my daughter who needs them for the virtual "learning" since schools are closed. She used them and also watched shows on her tablet. She loves them, thinks they're comfortable, and has no complaints. Really like them.

I have two pairs of these headphones. My children enjoy these headphones for participating in their online classes as well has entertainment. They seem to be quite comfortable too. Very pleased with the purchase.

I got these for my son for school with distance learning happening. I’ve had them a month and a half and they just broke. We really liked them up to this point but I think it’s crazy that they broke so soon.

This product is perfect. My kid is super picky when it comes to headphones but she says these are so comfortable and she can hear perfectly. We bought them specifically for virtual learning to block out noises and distractions around us, and this product does just that. The added bonus is the microphone so she can respond to her teachers accordingly. I would hands down, recommend these headphones.

We originally got these for a road trip so I didn't have to hear kids music or shows for 15 hours. It's been almost 3 months since I purchased these and they work so well. They fit his head perfectly, can even fit mine too. They come with a warranty too which is awesome. Definitely would recommend this product!

The box the headphones were in had been crushed and ripped open when we got them today. I plugged them in and the audio is a little fuzzy. I’m not sure if the sound quality is because the headphones were damaged when the box was damaged or if they always had poor audio.

The cord started breaking a couple weeks after only light use. As of now, they’re still working. But I’m a little disappointed that the cord isn’t a little sturdier for headphones made specifically for children.Update: I was contacted by the seller and they graciously sent another pair of headphones! Wonderful customer service! My son is enjoying his new headphones to the maximum!

My three year old loves these headphones. The fit is excellent on his head and the ear cushions are super soft. My only two complaints are the braiding on the cord soant hold up (see pic) and the volume limiting switch should be aced in a more obscure location so he can't easily change it on his own.

Ordered these for my kids to use with their PS4 and tablets. So far they love them. With my daughter's old headphones she used to complain that would hurt after using them because they were too loud, with these I don't have to worry about that. We just got them so I cannot speak to longevity yet!

I bought two, one for my 5 year old kindergartener and the other for my 6 year old 1st grader as we embarked on our new life of virtual school. I needed something that was comfortable for them to wear for hours at a time, canceled out surrounding noise and most importantly protected their ears. These headphones have all of it. My boys found them super cool and are able to adjust them if necessary on their own. They are not heavy at all. I was researching for safe headphones for days and days. i was happy to have found these and highly recommend these.

Bought these for my 6 yr old granddaughter to use on her first plane trip.  Fit well. Stayed in place. She could hear well but I did not have to worry about the volume control (yes, I checked it out).  I like the way they fold up.  Both the headphones and me survived the trip. :)

We got these headphones for my 20 month old for our first long road trip. He loved them right away and wanted to wear them without even being plugged in. However, we did plug them in to his tablet and they worked great! Were happy with the purchase we made!

Bought these headphones for my toddler girl for traveling. I was looking for something that had the feature with a safe volume control and these definitely do just that. I like the fact that the earphones part are foldable; therefore, more easily compact to travel. These have a great quality sound and I love the soft cushion on them. Glad I took my time to look and I see why the reviews are great. Will definitely recommend to others I know looking for headphones for their little one.

We loved them for my son to use at school! He only used them a handful of times in kindergarten so with Elearning this year I was excited we already had these headphones in perfect condition. They worked great until last week when the sound on the left side randomly stopped working... the cord is in perfect condition and I’ve tried in Seperate devices so I know it’s the headphones and not the actual Device. We loved these but just sucks they stopped working out of the blue in the middle of e learning :(

Bought these for my kindergarten for his online virtual learning.  He absolutely loves them and cancels out the sound. He says they are super comfy and doesn't take them off or on during his class time. Highly recommend.

I brought two of this for my grandchildren, they are twins.  They picked their own color and they love it.  The earpads are very soft and confortable, they like the one function most is that they can share the same music or zoom time with each other or their own friends.  I highly recommended for young age children.

These are really comfortable for my 8yo. Love that it has the microphone for distanced learning, and also really helpful that it has an additional jack to add another set of headphones. This is helpful if two kids want to watch the same thing, but also if I need to listen in on a class.

We bought 2 pairs for out kids, and they really were perfect for what we needed. unfortunately, one pair quit working after a few uses.EDIT: after posting about one pair having issues, they mailed us a replacement! Wonderful Customer service. And these headphones really are great. My kids love them, and i love that they can't turn them up too loud.

We thought this headset was great until they broke 4 months after buying them. The joints where they fold are very flimsy plastic so they can easily be broken in the opposite direction, which is exactly what happened during normal use.

Perfect for my 2nd grader to take to school.  I love that they fold up nicely and then come in a small box which i could put in his backpack for safe keeping.  I would order these again for sure.  Another great thing was that they were comfortable.  There is a soft padding for little heads.

These headphones are a game changer! Our 4 year old loves his tablet- but we don't love hearing it constantly throughout the day. This solves that issue! It helps him focus more on what he's watching and yet, he's still able to hear me when I call him. I love that it has volume limitations in place as well!

We just got these today. The kids were SO excited to try them out! they look nice, and feel soft! However, already the sound is not coming in consistently. It will play in one ear and not the other, then switch back to the other.  If I jostle the plug it will come in both ears for a minute and then go back to one ear or the other. Frustrating! With distance learning I need several pairs of headphones, but I will be looking else where... bummer. If it improves I will update.

I purchased 2 of these headphones to start at home learning with my children and so far am very impressed! They work great, look great, and the mic is actually of good quality.  I have already recommended them to my sister for her kiddos!

Got these for my 2.5 year old right before a travel trip. He now asks "where my headphones?" I'd say that's a win. I was curious to see how they would do on the noisy plane and although not noise cancelling, they still provided good sound. They fit his little head on the smaller setting and my big ole head on the bigger setting lol.

These are great. Iv bought multiple different kids headphones off of Amazon and I really like that the cord is a separate piece with this set. We have a cat that likes to chew wires on occasion and I've had to toss a few sets before as the wire and headset were all in one. The sound is great and the volume control is perfect.

These headphones are great!!!! The sound quality is really clear. I love that I can plug in and listen to what he’s hearing. This is a perfect addition to my sons virtual learning. Highly really recommend.

Great headphones for kids. My son doesn’t like ear buds and he’s a bit careless with electronics and these are perfect. Flexible, don’t have to worry about them bending or being dropped. Awesome product.

We were very undecided which headphones to order for our son, but we decided to buy these ones. Very nice surprise! The box and the item look fantastic, it is true that the sound and volume control would be better, but for the price, it is a great deal, highly recommended!

Ordered two of them for both of my kids. One is 6 and the other is 3. They loved them! We haven’t had any issues with them and they fit them perfect. Can’t beat the price! Most definitely recommend them!

Really nice little headphone set for my kid. One cool feature is that it has an audio output jack, so you could put a couple of these together from the same audio source so two kids could watch a movie from the same iPad.
Really great headphones! I have 3 little kids and they fight over this pair, so we’ll definitely have to order another. They have great sound, block other noises and fit really well.

bought this for our kids tablet to spare our sanity during road trips.  Headphones fold up and seem very soft on the ears. I really like that the cord is wrapped in a nylon which seems very durable and will hold up over time.

My 8yr old daughter loves these headphones!!! They’re comfortable and fun to wear.  She uses them primarily for distance learning.  She also uses them when we travel in an airplane.  The cool and convenient thing with these headphones is that she can connect her headphones with her little sister’s headphones when they want to watch the same show on the iPad. This avoids fights and arguments and both girls are able to share the iPad. As a parent, I would definitely recommend these headphones.

These headphones are much better quality than I was expecting. The part that goes over the ears is perfect: not too small and not too big. They are very comfortable as well. The sound quality is good and the volume limiting feature works well. My child hates wearing headphones, but he loves these. He asked for another pair to use at home as the other ones are for use at school. I will be purchasing another pair.

My child really liked these headphones to use for school.  However, the headphones picked up a radio station when plugged in or unplugged.  This was really distracting from his class so we had to return the headphones.

I bought these headphones for my son that has Autism. He often wears headphones plugged into his tablet. His old ones broke so I bought these. So far so good. He is very happy with them so far. They seem like they are good quality. I would definitely recommend.

Bought these for my 5 year old and she loves them. We are using them for her amazon fire tablet and it works perfectly. They were a great price for the quality. We loved that they fold up nicely to fit well into a back pack or storage bag for trips or travel. The color is so cute without being over the top as well.
My daughter is almost 6 and loves these.  They are basic and comfortable and appear that they will get the job done for our upcoming virtual semester at school.  She also likes the colors.

My daughters love the headphones - they like the design, color, transportability (the headphones fold) and most importantly the ability to connect the headphones into a chain to listen to a movie or education videos together. Very helpful if mom needs to help during on-line classes ... can share the sound and not bother others in the room. Great value for money.
Fit my 5 year old perfect for online school. Comfortable and has a microphone. My two-year-old has tried them on for fun and they are a little too big for her. (Just for sizing reference)

These are the most comfortable headphones and excellent sound quality. My son uses them for school and the microphone works well as we are online school for now. Also great so he can do videos and games while I work in peace and quiet. I have reordered this item twice and won't even look at another brand since these are definitely better quality than what we had previously.

These seemed great for the distance learning during Covid-19. We used them only for school a couple hours a day, carefully storing them after for the next day. To my disappointment they will cut out sound randomly and you’ll have to toggle the port thingy to try to fix it.

I got a pair of headphones for each one of my kids (four total) when we started online schooling in mid-March.  These are great quality.  They are all still Working well and in great shape after 6 weeks of heavy daily use.  And that’s despite the fact that my kids are hard on them (one of my kids is 3 years old and I’ve caught her dragging them around by the chord a few times!)  They especially like the feature where they can daisy-chain them together to all listen to the same thing.  Great product!

These headphones are great for elementary aged kids to use during virtual learning.  Good quality and sound, comfortable, and easy to plug in.  I ordered two pair (the blue and the aqua green) for my kindergartener and 3rd grader.  Great product for the money!  The only problem is that the kindergartener does a lot of songs/dancing so he sometimes wraps himself in the cord - so if you need to be more mobile, maybe consider a cordless option.  Otherwise they are great and getting the job done well!

Purchased this for my grand daughters to go with the tablets I was giving them for Christmas. They used them on the drive from south Texas back to Canada after the holidays, and according to my daughter, they worked perfectly. They must have been comfortable as the girls, ages 3 and 5, wore for several hours each day without complaints. It allowed the adults in the car to listen to the radio and visit while the girls were quietly entertained. Have also used several times since when having to accompany Mom to work, and again worked well. My daughter actually asked me to give these a good review as they have been so useful. It's only been 2 months of use but have been well worth it so far.

These headphones are exactly what we've been looking for. We wanted a comfortable set for my daughter to wear during home learning. I wanted her to have a mic and this one has one as well volume control. I worried it not being loud enough but on the lowest setting its perfect. If you need it louder you can turn it up, so easy! The cords are great. I have a cord twister so these will prevent them from fraying. We've gone through so many pairs because of this. Highly recommend!

My kids love these headphones. They’re comfortable and have great sound. The only reason I’m not giving 5 stars is because one pair broke within a year and the other pair just stopped working within about 18 months. Because of the decent quality and price and ordered the same pairs again.

We bought two pair of these (pink/purple) for use at home virtual school. They are very sturdy, nicely padded and comfortable for the kiddos. Microphone is neatly positioned on the wired cord. Definitely recommend.

Good headphones for the price, sound quality isn’t amazing but that’s to be expected with volume controlling headphones. They still get a little louder than I’m comfortable with but over all I would probably buy them again.

My wife and I bought two of these for our twin sons. I like that the volume is controlled and can’t be turned up way too loud. I also like the over the ear design. It helps with keeping it on their heads. We hope to have these for a long time. They’re great when paired with educational apps on the iPad. Our boys have learned so many words and concepts.
We just got these and are very pleased so far! Seem to be durable and well made! The cord is a cable and not a plastic wire so it should hold up well against a kids daily use. I would buy again!!

Just received these and tested them out prior to the start of the school year. They hooked up to Zoom seamlessly and were very clear in both the hearing and the microphone. I don’t see any issue being able to hear the teacher or respond. The product is also incredibly soft and comfortable which will be good for prolonged use.

The headphones came nicely packaged and fit every description listed. I personally like how they fit on the kids and the padding they provide. Not sure how durable they'll be but they came with a two year extended warranty.

This is the SECOND time I purchased these headphones. Both times one of the speakers stopped working out of nowhere after a short period of time. Super disappointed and I believe I should get a replacement

These are great budget headphones. Perfect for kids (I bought one for each of my boys and they really like them) sound quality is decent and matches the price. I would think most people (kids especially) would be very pleased with these headphones.

These are a good size for small heads. They work ok for my granddaughter that is the size of a 6 to 7 year old. I like that we can keep the volume controlled from being too loud. Hopefully these hold up to her abuse.

Great headphones that block out surrounding sound well. Have only had for a couple days and the cord is already fraying. Would just buy a new cord, but can't find a replacement with the volume limiter on it. Since the cord is already fraying, I don't know how long they are going to last.

Ok full disclosure, my son has only used these briefly BUT the quality seems very good. They are nice and soft/comfortable and fold up neatly for storage. These are awesome for our new virtual learning for elementary school.
I can only give a review for today since we just used them today.  We've ordered the blue.  They fit well for a child.  The cord is a good size.  They are also soft around the ears.

Got these for my 1st grader doing remote learning. They have worked really well for her, fit her nicely and the cushion around the ears and band are an extra nice touch. They cancel most of the noise around her but not everything, overall I'm satisfied with the effectiveness. It is really nice that they have a port to add another pair of headphones, I can plug in to hear her instructions when needed. Would recommend these to anyone looking for a pair of headphones with a mic built in!

These headphones come in colors that children will like. My daughter chose some funky colors but that’s what these kids are into now. The headphones are very comfortable not only on the ears but on top of the head as well. The cushion is soft and durable. The sound quality is good enough for a child but overall it’s great. I like that it has another jack because I can connect my other child’s headphones on the same tablet.
Bought for my daughter's virtual schooling and they have been working great. She's able to concentrate on her school work without getting distracted by surrounding sounds!

My daughter absolutely loves these headphones! They fold up for easy storage. The headphone jack cord is removable. I like that I can daisy chain 2 headsets together. It works perfect for times when my son and daughter are watching the same movie or listening to the same song. Highly recommend at this price point.

These are good headphones especially for children learning remotely. However I couldn’t figure out how to get my laptop to recognize the built-in microphone. This is common for all of our headphones, not just these. Fits well, comfortable.

I like that it’s comfortable for my kid and he can hear his Teacher well. I not sure how the mic work yet but every else is great. I am going to purchase one more for my other child as well for virtual school

She chose these over some super cute cat ear headphones because these fit her better and covered her ears. They are comfortable and work well. I wish they had more of an option for volume, but it works for what we need them for.
Works great for my LO with virtual schooling. Very comfortable material, very soft. The 2 different DB's to choose from are helpful. Highly recommend these headphones.

My 8 year old daughter liked it a lot and She use it for about 1-1:5 hours everyday.The color is beautiful as on photo; the item smooth and easy to adjust. The noise cancellation and sound quality is very good. And it is great value for money.
Great for 7-8 year old. Used in on an airplane ride long ago. Now using it for homeschooling which is perfect. The noise canceling helps so he’s not easily distracted.

The sound quality is pretty good and I love that you can connect two of those together so that the kids can share the same music. The problem is that the foam padding over the ear makes the headphone unbearably hot. I tried them myself and couldn't tolerate them for more than a few minutes. My 7- and 5-yr olds have also been complaining about how the headphone makes their head hot and don't want to use them anymore.

Headphones worked great for car and air travel. Paired nicely. Now 6 months later, one pair has such low volume output that we can't hear out of it while the other still works fine. They're both worn and used about the same, so it just seems like a product defect.

I bought one pair for my daughter. She loved them so much I bought a second for my son. These are perfect for small ears. They are adjustable in both size and volume control. They are VERY comfortable and the cord being fabric covered is awesome. The coolest part is they can plug into each other’s headphones. I would debut these again.

The headphones are awesome. I bought them fir my daughter zoom classes, after her broke a week after we bought them. These are really great, the noise cancellation is an excellent feature as well as the fact that she is limited on how loud she can hear. An added bonus is the cute pink, she loves it. I think overall her learning experience just got better! I recommend buying these great product.

These worked well for a 9 and 6 year old during 10000 zoom calls this spring. The only downside is after a while they would bother my daughters ears because of her earring backs. but for shorter use she loved them!

These are a great quality and the price was right.  We bought for my daughter to have for her school work and she loves using them so much she wants to use them all the time.  I like the volume control feature, and she says they are comfortable.  win win!

We bought this for our daughter's online school, fits her really good. It has a good noise canceling quality without it being too high for her age (6YrOld).  The only thing I would have liked to see is the ability to increase or decrease the volume from the headset, the button it has just makes it easier to block higher noises around her. Sound quality is good, a little concerned about the folding feature because it leaves a little of the headset cable exposed so it could be easily damaged if not stored safely
Here I am, back on Amazon to buy another set of headphones for my kiddo. Bought them in Dec 2019, and they are toasted. No sound coming out of them at all. What a waste of money.

Just received these headphones and they are great. My five year old said they were “sooo comfy” when he put them on. They seem to be great quality and I love that the plug is angled to help prevent breakage.

My 8 year old was using my beats. Constantly complained they were hurting and too loud so I order these.  They are awesome.  Great sound,  complete comfort, and she loved picking out the color.  I've added 3 more pairs to my cart for my other kids.
My daughter loves how comfy it is and it fits perfectly on her head! Now she will love using it in school, she is so excited! I love how the microphone is built into the wire!
Update:Great customer support.  Sent a replacement set of Bluetooth headphones.  Now there is no issue with the cable.

My sister loves them.  She was happy to find out that you can plug one headset into the other so when one of her kids tablets died she was able to plug her sons headset into her daughters and they were able to watch the movie on the tablet and she was able to have peace and quiet.

I got this headset for my 7 years old daughter. Cute simple headsets. I was originally thinking to get Bluetooth headset, but I decided to get this one since I do not want to have Bluetooth connection issues while she will be on the Zoom meeting with her class. This product is one of the few headsets with a microphone. I haven't tried this feature yet, but it is a huge plus!

I bought these for my son who is attending Kindergarten virtually. It has been great for him to work with his teacher and I don’t seem to bother him while working from home. His only complaint is they hurt his ears where his glasses are, but aside from not using headphones for 5 hours a day, this is an excellent option!

I love that these have volume control to protect from high volumes. I also love the feature to connect the headphones to listen to the same thing together, this has saved me from numerous arguments. They’re sturdy enough for handling for from my 18 month old and 3 year old

I am impressed with the headphones. They are perfect for kids who are in meetings for their online school. My kid loved it. another cool feature is the second port for you or another kid if you want to hook second set and listen what he is listening to.Mic is sharp and you have that option to change the output to lower db setting which is cool.
Bought them for my 7 year old's virtual class. Today's his first day using them and he hasn't complained about them hurting or not being able to hear.  He hasn't used the microphone yet.

Super comfortable. On the day my daughter got these, she spent the afternoon with them on without being plugged into any music! Love the turquoise/purple colors. Wish there was an option for an even lower sound limit. When I tried these on, the sound could still get pretty loud, even on the indoor setting.  That said, I would definitely purchase again. I also have an adult pair of MPow noise-cancelling headphones that I love.
it's comfortable for my ears. adjustable to fit. nice color. quality seems good. my little one will try it once I let it air out, it have some plastic smell when I opened it. worth the price.
I order these for my 9 year old son when they were on sale. These headphones are worn daily and yet still look and sound brand new. This was an excellent purchase at a great price.
Within a month, sound only plays on one side. Waste of money. Bought 2 pairs, both had the exact same problem.

When plugged into computer you have to move cord around to get a good clear sound.  Disappointed because these are not the cheapest. I had a pair from 5 below that worked better and we can't find them. Since we are not leaving the house we decided to order these.  maybe we got a bad batch but ours all three of them.

I really like the fact that my kids can hook one to the other and both listen to the same thing on one tablet. They seem very sturdy, we’ve had them for a few months now, they're portable and do well on car trips.I’ve even borrowed them after the kids have gone to bed so that I could watch a movie in peace on my laptop.
Great product! Fits my 7yr old nicely and is perfect for distance learning. Noise canceling must be amazing bc I definitely have to yell to get her attention.
We bought these for our kid. They work really well and she loves them. They’re comfortable and sound great. They fold up nicely too. I would definitely recommend buying these for your kid.

My 5yo loves these and says he can’t hear me when they are over his ears... so take that as you wish... but they are better than his previous pair he had. (Different brand) would buy again if needed. I cant

They are great for what they’re designed for (children). I like the volume control switch. I would’ve rated five stars if these earphones would have the Bluetooth function added. I knew before head they didn’t but I wanted to try them anyway. They look well made and nicely padded and comfortable on the speakers section. I would buy them again if they could be wireless.

I love these headphones for my kids. I love knowing that their hearing is protected, the sound quality is great, the headphones are comfortable to wear, and my kids always crowd together to watch the ipad together and this lets them all hear when they link them together, and I can still hear myself think.

Bought these for a plane ride for my 4 year old so he could watch movies. I was concerned that they would be uncomfortable for him and that he wouldn’t wear them, but turns out he loves them!  Wore them the entire flight, both coming and going. Wish I had bought these sooner for previous flights.

Update**  Seller contacted me upon the review. Apparently the first one I received was a defect and sent replacement asap. I received the replacement within a week and the new one works well. Great service!!!!I bought this for my daughter's school zoom meetings. However, it doesn't work at all. The mic does not pick up her sound so her teachers could never hear her.  It's in the trash now. 😫😫

Love these! I went through 2 pairs of headphones PER CHILD until I found these. They're great. They work so well my kids cannot hear me call for them when they're playing 😂Totally affordable and great quality. Plus I was able to get a color for each child which they loved! Two thumbs up!

These work great for my three and four year olds who use them with their Kid Fire tablets.  The ability to connect the two sets together has come in handy when one tablet was low on battery or forgotten, as they were able to share. They do slip off my daughter's head easily because they are so soft, but it's not a big deal. Love these and will buy again.
My daughter loves it, she was able to pick the color and it is working perfection for her distance learning this school year. Has been using it for 3 weeks no issues.

Purchased for my 7yrs daughter.The button to reduce the volume doesn't work at also she claims that sometimes it doesn't connect to her tablet so she need to unplug and replug it. Im not sure if its the phones or the tablets' fault

Great sound! Super soft & comfy headphones! Really cute & unique colors :0) We will be using them for homeschool daily & also be using them for her I-pad for games, shows & music ;) Great for at home stuff, travel & just being out & about in the car! So happy we purchased these :) I would highly recommend!🤩🎧🎤🎼

Bought this for my 10-year-old to use for online school. Had already tried another brand for kids that was more expensive and they did not fit her head and were of poor quality. These conform much better to kids' heads and you can feel the solid quality right out of the box. Mic sound was good and so was the sound when listening to music. I like the volume control switch.

I ordered 2 pairs of these headphones for my kids for virtual school. They came quick and fit both kids great! They love the bright colors. The sound quality is really good, and the microphone picks up well. They aren't completely noise cancelling, but I don't mind because it lets me ask the kids questions/get their attention without them having to take the headphones on and off. So far, I would definitely order these again.

Good quality. I like the cord that doesn't seem like it will tangle or break very easily. I also like that I can plug in my earbuds and hear what he is hearing. These are very cute and comfortable (I tried them on). Seem like a good set of headphones for virtual learning - we shall see if they last!

Great set of headphones! Headphones with a mic was required for e-learning and these surpassed my expectations! The sound quality is great and the mic is at the perfect spot on the cord so it does not need to be held to the mouth when speaking. These were an awesome value and did not break the bank for our multiple learners.

Our son recently turned 4 and loves his tablet time. Tried an old pair of my headphones with him and he liked it, but they were worn out. So my wife and I figured let's see what sort of kids headphones are available. We found these and they arrived quickly. Worked great, nice texture and comfortable feel (he isn't moving them around as much on his head).

Bought these for my son that has sensory and sound issues. Not only does he live the fit, but they do just what they say they will. He has been able to work on his school work wearing these without frustration happening due to the noise around him. Thank you so much. He is 7 and fits him perfectly.

My daughter loves her headphones. They are soft enough that they don’t hurt her ears, which has always been a complaint until now. I like how the fold up for easier storage. I also like how the volume level can be limited.
Perfect headphones for kids doing online school.  I love that they have a port that you can have multiple headphones connected to one device also.
We lose & break headphones a lot with 6 kids so I buy cheap ones. These are decent quality for the price. We haven't used them long enough to comment on the longevity yet.

Just got these in for an upcoming trip with my 20 month old! Love the colors (teal and purple) and the overall look of the headphones. The padding is amazing and envies my headphones!The sound quality is great and it does block out a decent amount of ambient noise when I tested it out.

Just got it,but I'm really pleased.  The cord is rope-y instead of plastic witch I'm hoping will help it last longer when you have boys that like to fiddle with things.  I cant really tell the difference in the two volumes.  But it seems loud enough...  time will tell how I feel about that.

Great headphones for a kid, just got them but they seem much more durable than others i have tried. Good sound but the volume control is only 2 step and not much of a jump. Very happy with the purchase.

Got these for my daughter for upcoming distance learning.  We plugged them into a phone and did a quick phone call to ensure that they worked well - all seemed great, sound quality and the microphone piece, which is the main thing we were looking for.  Also love that they fold up for easy transportation.

My kids now have to wear headphones for ~3 hours a day, and these are nice and cushy, so they don't mind much. And they have a microphone, so they can participate in class meetings. They also cancel out a fair amount of background noise, so all of us can be on video meetings (with headphones and some chatting) without bothering each other. Just what we needed!

Fits my ten year old - he’s got a big head so it might not forever but I’m pleased. They are really comfortable and I love the sound limit. They do reduce noise but not cancel it. Enough to be used in the car on a long trip. Love the folding feature and I also bought a case for it to stay safe on trips. I plan for them to be used for virtual learning and the microphone should hopefully work well for that. Pleased enough to buy a second pair for my second child.

We used these headphones flying yesterday. While they did a decent job with noise, it was still a little difficult to hear over the noise of the plane. On a regular day, these are fantastic for us. I did switch the volume button higher and you could definitely tell a difference. Glad we purchased these! Love the folding feature. It made packing easier.

I bought this headset to use with my daughter with her distance learning education at this time. It is working out great for hear and she really likes the builtin microphone. I will be buying another one for my son shortly to use with school as well.

We bought these headphones for school and did a test run tonight. For some reason Siri keeps coming on when my daughter uses these headphones. Is there something we’re doing wrong? Won’t be good if Siri keeps popping up while we’re in school at home.
Headphones stopped working shortly after purchase. The company replaces them and our second pair is now not working after a few uses. Terrible quality. Guess you get what you pay for.

Great headphones for preschooler and kindergartener. Should have known better than the let the preschooler "play" with them - somehow he was able to pull the wire apart! Not in a place where it would attach to anything either. Just be aware. Otherwise, great build, great for little heads, and allows two to be plugged together to listen to one device.

I bought this for my 8 year old for school.  They are very comfortable for her to wear all day.  The sound and noise cancelation is very good.  Also, I love to option  to plug in my headphones and hear what she is hearing.  This is very helpful during a Google Meet with her teacher. Love all the color options too.  I wish they had a bit larger size for my older, pre-teen child.

I bought this specifically because it says it comes with a mic. Where is the mic?? I tested these against another pair that doesn’t have a mic and the sound was exactly the same. When talking on zoom my child isn’t any clearer than the 9$ pair of headphones I got from Walmart. Waste of 23$

This product is great for kids! The only downfall is after about a month one headphone stops working with the sound. We are on our second set (in a year's time) because of that issue. My son still loves them and doesn't mind because the surrounding sound is cancelled out. Love the fit and that's why we bought a replacement pair  Would recommend.
Perfect size for a kindergartener! Foldable, easy to store, and they feel well made. Will update if there's issues with them after a few weeks of school

This is our second pair after my daughter accidentally sat on her first pair. She really liked them and asked to replace them with the same model. We will use it for school Zoom meetings when they start up.

The best kids headset I've found. Super comfort on head and ears area. Noise limiting on the sturdy rope like cord. Built in microphone, much like cell phone headsets, keeps kids from breaking it easily. Even the audio Jack is designed for kids, by increasing the rubber and NOT having it at a 45 degree angle, keeps it from getting worn down as fast.

A goid pair of starter headphones for the kids. The design is good, yhe build quality is sturdy and the headphones are comfortable... My kid has no complaints.The buit in microphone is an additional benefit. Can't speak to the sound quality but that doesn't really matter for kids wanting to attend online classrooms.

I bought one pair for both of my kids. (boy & girl) The headphones are high quality! My kids said they are comfortable. Sound quality is also great. My kids couldn't stop smiling when they put them on. I am one happy mom and customer! I recommend these head phones.

I saw the headphones being utilized in the first grades of my school.  I was impressed with the ease with which the students used them.  I am a tutor and will use the headphones in my tutoring sessions.  It is comforting to know that I will not have keep monitoring their volume control.
Love the microphone feature. Bought 3 pairs for my kids remote learning. Have been a lifesaver so far. They can’t hear one another at all and are in same room!

best money I have spent! My 3 year old uses them daily. As most 3 year olds are not careful with their things, he has beaten these things and still working great, not broken or anything. Very VERY durable!! The rope like cord is an excellent plus! Highly recommend for toddlers!
Great and comfortable fit for kids. I like that the cord doesn’t detach so my kids won’t loose it (happened with our last pair). Attractive design. So far, so good!

Absolutely love this purchase. I bought both the blue and green as well as the blue and black pair. With my children both doing remote learning during these times, it has made it less distracting with the noise cancelling and both being able to join their classes simultaneously without distracting one another. Also loving the feature to connect the headphones to one another if/when listening or watching something. Perfect for upcoming round trips.

These are very well made and surprised me for an Amazon purchase. I was expecting the quality to be comparable to the dollar store! Colors are vibrant (blue and teal option)Would buy again in a heartbeat

These headphones are great. I love the sound sharing feature. It has come in handy when my son is online doing virtual school and I can listen in to what his teacher is saying.  I definitely recommend them!

I bought this for my third grader and she is enjoying it for music, school videos (with remote learning).  She says they are comfortable and good sounds quality.  The headphones are not overly big for kids and it is something she will be able to use for multiple years moving forward.  I have a few products from MPOW and everything I have bought have always seem to be of good quality with an excellent price!

We bought two of these - one each for my 4 year old and one for my 2 year old for a flight to Hawaii. They worked perfectly- we love that they kind of fold down and that the cord is like a rope like material. Made it convenient for travel plus they stayed on both of my children!

Headphones have a lot of cushioning. Great fit for 6 year old daughter. Sound is great and the built-in mic works great. Purchased these to replace a more expensive headset because teachers were reporting that they could only hear my daughter faintly. My daughter's teacher report that they have no problems hearing her now.
I love this brand. I've bought the wireless ones and loved them so decided to try these out for my kids. They work great and fit really well. Perfect for school and home. Definitely recommend these!

My daughter loves these headphones. She has only had them for a little over a month but they have a short in them somewhere...She was watching her show with them on and out of no where said she cant hear anything. I moved the cord around and could hear scratchy noise but no sound. Oh well guess we will do without for a while. Still going to re buy and hope the next pair works better.

I bought my son a pair a few months ago but, he lost them so I repurchased them. He loves these. They’re comfortable and he can talk with his cousin on video games. The sound is clear on the microphone
I can’t speak on quality yet since we’ve only had them for a day but my 4 year old son loves them and says they are very comfortable. So we will see! Happy buyer so far.
These are great headphones for kids. We had them all of a few hours before my cat got a hold of them but my son learned an important lesson. I’ve now purchased his second set. Merp.

Bought these headphones for my 1st grade son as he's doing remote/distance learning at this pt. They work reasonably well - he says he hears his teacher/class pretty well. We happen to sit in the same office at home (so I can assist w/ the video conference if needed) and often I'm talking to colleagues on the phone yet my son isn't disturbed. I assume the noise cancelling works well enough for him to stay focused, as focused as a 1st grader can be in a video conference class!

Works decently and as expected for price. The box didn't mention the microphone feature, so I was initially worried that the wrong version was sent, but it works. We also received the wrong color which is an issue if your kids are picky and frustrating bc we had paid more for the selected color and received another.Update: the company reached out immediately and sent the correct color. They were very kind and easy to work with.

These are decent headphones but not the greatest quality. The fact that can fold up is nice for storage, but also makes them susceptible to breaking easily with repeated use. At times, sound will also play in the headphones and through the speaker of the device you're plugged into at the same time. Served it's purpose for a few vacations with kids, but wouldn't buy again.

I bought these headphones for my ten year old son to use the computer in his virtual classes and play his famous fortnite game on his xbox and he loves it, they listen very well and the microphone works well too. I recommend them.

Great headphones for kids going back to school remotely! I have 2 kids and they are able to participate in class without disturbing each other. Love the hearing protection with sound control to protect little ears. Kids say they're nice and comfy. Bonus feature of being able to plug both headphone together and share the moment. Also love that they are compact and easy to store. Overall we're happy to have made the purchase.

Niece needed a headset for school since the one provided by the school was not cutting it. After looking through amazon and other places I’ve stumbled across these and I promise you they are the best you can buy for your little one doing online ! Comfy and block the other noise . It’s a must by for parents !
These broke after using for 3 weeks. Don’t waste your money.

I tested these out on my computer, and they seemed plenty loud on the 85db setting. The 95 was too loud. My son is going to try them at day care next week for his school Zoom classes, I love that they are comfy and cover the ears well. Hoping they'll work great for him!
I got these for my kids for distance learning on their chrome book. They said they are comfortable and have no trouble hearing the teacher.
Perfect fit for my 5 year old starting kindergarten.  Great quality.  They are padded for comfort.  I would definitely recommend.

Bought this for my 9yr so he can take to school instead of him taking his very expensive video game earphones. I was very skeptical but read other reviews and thought I give it a try especially for the price. My son actually loves it and says that the sound quality is very good. And the feel of the quality is pretty good too! The price was cheap and I'm glad the quality wasn't cheap either. These are good/decent earphones when you don't want your kid to take his nice expensive headphones to school and run the chance of getting stolen or broken.

not working properly after sitting there for two month. purchased at the end of june, got the item at the begining of july when school is out to prepare for the semester. it was only used 3 times during the summer. now class is started but the headphone is not working. so disappointed.  also the volume limitted is broken since day one, when you turn the volume turns high it goes high not limited to what it said 85/94.
Hard time finding headphones that fit a toddler.  These are awesome.  Great fit and snug.  They don't fall off her head.  Pretty durable also.

I got these headphones for my preschool-aged daughter for an upcoming trip. We've tested them out at home and she loves how they block out the noise so she can hear the movie or music. I like the volume feature and we both like that another set of headphones can be piggybacked onto hers. I also think the folding feature is nice but wish there was a case or some way to keep them folded for transporting.

Love this and the kids do too. Great for when they are sharing an iPad and both need head phones- one can plug into the others headset and listen at the same time. Great for traveling to which we do a lot of.

These work great for both school and home. Bought for my Kindergartener and she loves the color, the sound quality and the fact that she can adjust the volume. The side jack also lets her watch YouTube with a friend without me having to listen to the same song for the millionth time.
My 10-y-o daughter loves them. But I feel that the sound cancellation isn't the best... But for the price, I shouldn't complain!

We bought these headphones for our son to use for virtual school this semester. We didn't want to get him earbuds as they can get lost and nasty from neglect, so these fit the bill. Extremely impressed with the build quality and noise cancellation, especially for the price. Audio quality is good, not great, but again we are talking about $16 headphones. Buy them.

These are comfortable. I bought them for my son who happens to have a smaller head. It fir perfectly AND comfortably! Ears adjust and move up and down with head.The only thin I don’t like is that the volume doesn’t go lower for highest measure. My son son likes it cranked to the max which is why we purchased this product.

For the price these are definitely worth it. We’ve gone on several trips by air and car with these and they work great. They fit my 3 year old great and they are durable and cozy. We haven’t had an issues with them so far and hoping they last a long time.

I ordered these for my kids to start e-learning for school.  They are perfect and my kids love them!  The fold up to fit perfectly in their storage bin, can’t turn them up too loud and the love the microphone feature so they’re still able to converse with their teachers.  They also come with a free 2-year warranty which is awesome when you have boys who are rough with everything.

Love these headphones. They are perfect for virtual schooling for the kids right now and I like the adjustable volumes for the kids so that it's not overly loud. They are both functional and stylish and the kids love them too.
They are not highest quality plastic, but overall, better than I thought. Volume control is good, the sharing is awesome, my kids love that feature.

I bought these for a long international flight for my two toddler children. We did not open them until just before the flight. Within an hour the yellow pair had broken and the pink pair had just stopped working. To say that I was annoyed was an understatement. Such a waste of money and even worse, being stuck on a 10+ hour flight with two grumpy made me regret my purchase even more. Just feels like a con to not be reimbursed for buying a junky/faulty product.
With remote learning part of our lives, I ordered two pair for my boys to make remote learning more interactive and personal.

Bought for my toddler to use while traveling. Realized they didn’t work right on our first trip. Sound is terrible.  Amazon won’t let me return them since the return window closed 2 days ago.Update- company sent me a replacement for free which works great.  Definitely made up for the initial quality issue!
Nice headset for kids. Sturdy enough and it’s great that you can connect it to another pair of heads phones so they share an iPad or something.

Compared to other headsets I’ve purchased for my son, these are the best in quality. The others were flimsy but these are sturdy, comfortable, and they open and close easily. I also love the fact that they offer so many colors!! We love them!

Got this for my 6 year old for this year's distance learning, and we are very satisfied! The headphones are of very good quality and fit her head perfectly. She is still trying to get the hang of the volume control, but that's more of a learning curve, no defects in the product. Great for school, and she can also plug them into her tablet to play games, which gives mom and dad some peace and quiet.
I love MPOW I had a gaming headset from them that worked like a charm for 4 years. Got these for my daughter and she loves them! Thanks for not letting me down!
I bought these for distance learning for my son. They fit well and I like the volume max control for little ears. He says it sounds great and loves the blue color. They work well with his Ipad.
My daughter loves these. I don’t know about the noise cancellation feature because they’re small, kids headphones, but once they’re on her head and the iPad is in front of her, game over.
So far so good. Kids love them.  Gave 4 stars cuz we just got them an I am not sure how long they will last.  Will update later. Very nice looking!
After a few uses the sound already started getting glitchy and only coming out one ear at a time. Great when it works but expected to get more than a few uses.

Bought this for our 1yr old to take on an airplane ride. Was worried they would be too big but for well and she did not fuss with them. Sound quality hasn’t been tested but our biggest concern was fit on such a small person and they work!
My son loves these headphones!  He uses it for not only listening to his music, but also to talk to others and to keep the noise out when things are too overwhelming. It’s awesome.

I bought this headphone for my son to use when doing his remote learning. So far it’s working well. He heard clear sounds from both side. The best part is that it can connect with his sisters headphone, so they can join the same online zoom meeting. It’s a win for everyone!

These headphones ended up being all & everything that I was searching for to be used in kindergarten for my 5 year old son. Not only do they fit him perfectly & comfortably, they are so adjustable that they will do the same for all shapes & sizes. They also are very durable & stylish. Highly recommend & a very reasonable price!
My daughter loves these! She used them for virtual school and I also bought another pair for gaming! They're not only comfortable but noise cancelling and good value for the price!
We’ve had this a few weeks and my daughter loves it! They are comfortable and she likes the style, and she actually wears them. I don’t know about the sound control option but for us this suits us.

The sound quality is good and we chose it over similar products at the same price. Although I noticed my daughter feels she couldn't hear when switching to the headphone from her iPad speaker. Seems like a volume adjustment is required and she does not know how to do that.
The headphones did not even last a month. The plastic piece that goes into the audio jack is cracking. Parts of the cord is coming apart as well. I am extremely disappointed.
My 6yr old loved them during homeschooling and he said they were comfortable. They have really nice padding around the ears.

I got these for my kids, when they were on sale for black Friday. They are awesome!! Something I didn't know they had is:The opposite side of the wire has a hole to plug in a second set of headphones.

Ordered 3 pairs for my kids (ages 7-12) to use for their virtual schooling and there have been wonderful! They are very simple for them to use, sound is clear and I can't hear anything on the outside of them! Seem like they're made to last.

I'm a big fan of MPOW products as I've used their cell phones stands in the past & these headphones are perfect for the modern world. Distant learning has made working from home a challenge, & now that my daugther has MPOW headphones I can concentrate on my work while she concentrates on hers. It's a great quality set of headphones with great color options to suit any and all personalities.

These are good, but the downside is that you have to hold down a button in order to use the mic. I bought these for my son so he could record while filming on his tablet, but he can’t for that purpose because he needs one hand to hold down the button. I honestly don’t want to deal with the return so I’m just taping the button down. But that part felt overall unnecessary.
Awesome headphones! My 9 year old loves them so much, I had to order a second set: one for home use and one for use in school.
Great fit for kids!Bought these for my son  and they work great!!, The colors are his favorite colors as an added bonus.

Super comfy, my toddler loves them! Bought for an upcoming plane trip but when we tried them on her she didn’t want to take them off.  They feel well made and I love that they fold up so they’re easy to fit in the diaper bag.

During the current situation I needed to buy new earbuds for my kids to do online learning with out breaking the bank. I bought these firstly cause of the price and then because of reviews. Once they came in and the kids all tried them out they were perfect for what they needed.
These are perfect for my 2 girls! Very soft, great sound, and durable. I also really like that they are foldable and don't take up too much room.

After going through lot many products, I decided to buy this product from amazon. As the schools have started online, I desperately wanted one headphone with mic for my daughter. This product is very amazing in terms of quality and ease in use. Also it has a foldable design and you can store it in your table drawer easily. My daughter loves the color. Thanks Mpow for this great product

Our kids, like most, have been tossed into the world of online school. We needed some durable, comfy headphones that they could wear for hours a day that sounded great and looked cool with their school clothes (nobody wants to be the kid on the zoom call with a weak headphone game, amiright?) These arrived quickly, fit our kids heads perfectly, and they love to use them all the time. Buy these, they rule the online school.

Purchased for my daughter (7 yrs) to use for her online classes.  Per my daughter, the sound quality is great, very comfortable to use, and the built-in microphone picked up her conversations clearly.  Will definitely purchase again.

There isn't anything to not like about these headphones. I bought 2, one each for my two kids in elementary school.  It helps them stay focus and block out noise from around the home while they are in class. The headphones are not flimsy, they are strong and durable. I like that it has a maximum audio volume fit for kids' ears because I was worried about getting a headphone that may damage their ears. This one is perfect!

We bought these headphones in Jan but ended up not needing them. Opened them yesterday and today they broke. The cord came right out from where the sound adjuster is.  Wish I could say more but that about sums up our experience.

I got these for my 7 year old as I am currently home schooling him. He really liked them. The only thing I would change is a volume control button. You are not able to control the volume on the headphones.

They are nice, comfortable and even though our tablet is very loud this headphones make the work. Great sound quality, noise and volumen contro. Bought case separately and it is a great combination to keep them safe and clean when not in use.

I ordered these for my 7 year old daughter. They are built well, and the price is great. The sound is also great and the noise cancellation is fantastic, even at low volumes she can't hear me when I'm talking to her LOL. I would highly recommend these for any child. I would rate these five stars all day.

The sound is amazing, however I bought the headphones so that it would limit the volume to 85 dcb and these head phones do not do that. I set it to the 85dcb setting and turned up the volume as high as I could and it was way too loud and hurt my ears.

Bought 2 pair for my boys. They love them! I love them also, no more loud YouTube videos and games. They are definitely noise cancelling. I can’t get my boys attention unless I tap them if they have them on. Great product though!

These headphones fit nicely over my kids ears.  There is extra cushioning on the part that sits on the very top of the head for added comfort.  Both of my kids love that they can plug into each others head set to enjoy the same music or movie.  Added bonus that I didn't realize, there is a switch to set the sound limit to either 85dB or 94dB.  I have one kid who is very sensitive to sounds.  These work amazing for him.

Great bang for your buck. Lightweight and sturdy. Kids love it for their online classes. Perfect fit for their head size. The colors and texture of the exterior looks great.  I do like the fact that it has the volume limiting option when needed vs. other headphone that have this built in but now way to turn it off.
The headphones are soft and comfortable. The sharing feature is awesome! the sound is perfect. So far so good <3

Great headphones! Have a pair for each of my boys. They are soft around the ears and comfortable for them. I like them as well when I’ve used them. Love that they connect to one another so they can share a device and both hear it. Definitely recommended!

We have bought these for our kids and for their classrooms at school!  The fit is great and kids find them really comfortable.  Safety feature with controllable volume to keep their ears protected.  The actually fit me as well.  Nice and snug without being tight.  Great buy!

There's only two settings for the volume but they work great formy kids virtual learning. I love the option of them being able to connect another set of headphones for sharing. My kids love them and I like that there were different options
My 5 yr old likes them ok.  Customer service sucks.  Don’t try attempting to get the “2 yr warranty” with the card attached with purchase....waste of 45 mins of your life.

Bought these headphones for my daughter to use on a family road trip.  The headphones work great! I tested the sound quality and it is good and love the ability to control the max dB level.  My daughter used these the entire trip and said they were very comfortable.  Absolutely recommend these for travel and will be getting my nieces and nephews a pair for Christmas!

The headphones look great and feel like they would be very comfortable. We haven’t used them yet to see about quality of sound and to see if the mic works well. I’ll update review when we use tomorrow!

My kids LOVE these headphones! The first comment they made when they first put them on was about how comfortable they felt. As a mom, I like that they are adjustable, have a built-microphone, easy-to-use volume control, and comes with a free 2-year warranty. My kids will be learning remotely this year and I feel that these headphones are the perfect addition to our "classroom".

We have been very happy with this purchase. The headphones have very soft padding and fit very well. They seem to do a good job of noise canceling, helping with focus during remote learning. It has been extremely helpful for me to plug my ear buds into the headphones so I can hear what is going on in the class. I would highly recommend purchasing this product.
These arrived faster than expected and work great! I ordered two pairs and both my boys love them. Thank you!
My Niece love this headphones as soon as she saw them! she try them for the new norm (School from home) and she is in love! now she uses them for everything!
Working for my sensory 7yo son. The padding on the ears helps him focus On the important things and not the headphones.

Wow! I was really impressed woth the quality for the price point. I got these for my kindergartener for her first year of distance learning. I’m also impressed with the warranty. Will be buying a (backup) pair for my son as well!

We purchased three of these for our kids to use on road trips and they are excellent. The fact that they can connect to each other and essentially all listen to the same device with only one kid plugged in is great for watching videos or when my 3 year old wants to hear music on her brothers MP3 player. GREAT BUY!
These are well built headphones for children! I like how there’s a volume limiter knob attached to the cord as well. Overall they seem sturdy, well built and should last a while!

My daughter is 6 and she did say her ears hurt after awhile but she is having to be on the computer a long time for school. Otherwise great easy for her to use product. I like that there is cushion on the head band part as well. Can’t wait to see if they work we’ll connected with her baby brothers headphones for trips.
Nice value for 2 headphones!I needed new ones for the kids iPads,

I bought 3 headphones for students in 1st and 2nd grade and they work great for their online learning! The coolest thing about the headphones is the extra jack that in the right ear of the headphone where I can check in and hear what my students are doing. I've put on the headphones myself and they definitely are noise cancelling and they are comfortable. Definitely will buy more if I have more students!

Great headphones with mic for kids! Amazing comfort and sound quality. Perfect for back to school and video conferencing with instructors for our 3rd grader. Arrived neatly packaged and in perfect condition, well manufactured. Has some sound cancelation, but does not cancel outside sound completely, however, that was not advertised- so was not expected. Would definately purchase again.

I got this for my son who is starting kindergarten. It is comfortable for him and he is able to keep it on for hours. I appreciate the noise level control. The cord is sufficiently long and durable. The noise cancellation seems adequate. Although he has only had it for a few days, the headphones seem sturdy enough for a child to use on a daily basis.
These fit my 5 year old perfect and do not slide off. I like the db toggle switch on them. my daughter is very happy with these. These can be warranty for 2 years after registering them MPOW.

I was pretty excited about this because of the microphone and control for the volume. And the reviews were all really positive!!!But when it arrived, the volume control didn’t work.
