I was so bummed because it was for my 11 month old to use on our trip tomorrow and he grabs everything when watching my iPad. So now, I can’t use it because the volume limitation doesn’t work. And it is going to be a looooong trip tomorrow. Very sad and disappointed!
These are reportedly comfortable. No complaints from my kid users. I would say works best for kids under 8.
My boys love these headphones!  We have 3 pair now and I'm sure I will get more for school. They fit perfectly and the sound is great for the price.

Great headphones for kids!! Very soft ear pods and the rim on the top. Adjustable head size. I bought them for my child to bring to school but just ordered one more to keep at home. And very vivid blue color, super cute. My 8 year son absolutely love it!
My 8 year loves these. They are soft and comfortable and work great for all the virtual learning this year!
Just awesome. Very nice covering kids ears: soft,  no pressure. color is bright- may daughter loves it.
Got these for the kids when we got our amazon fire 10s these work pretty good I’ve tried them a couple times while setting up the fire 10s and they work great
My nephew loves it. Also I bought one of each to my kids and they loved it.Pretty durable as well.

The headphone have a really nice kid-friendly interface. The sound quality is nice and the music sharing option is very cool. One thing to note, though, is that the headphones can't expand to be that big. Overall, my kid really liked these headphones and I would recomend this to others.
Fun and comfortable headphones. My son loves to hook these up to his brothers so they can share a movie together. Great idea.
These are perfect for distance learning. The sound quality is good, mic works well, and they fit an elementary/primary school child's head comfortably. My kid chose pink and loves them.

We have had two of these. The first did eventually break and stop playing in one side, but overall we were happy with how long it lasted (6 months). The woven cord covering made the headphone cord quite flexible and that seemed more durable than others we have owned. Unfortunately, we did not register for the warranty with the first pair, but have fort there second.

We go through head phones a lot with my 6 year old.  These are very comfortable and they fold up which allows for less breakage when they are thrown around.  The sound is good and the volume control works.  Definitely a good buy.
These are perfect for my son! He loves wearing them and it makes the house so peaceful during his tablet time!
Broke after 3 months. Plug now produces a static sound unless held the right way(Just like older 90’s versions of headphones did).

I bought 3 of these headphones for my 3 daughters. Now they can use their headphones independently and also plug into each others headphones and listen to movies on our iPad together. These are quality headphones! They have a premium sound and feel.
Mi hijo los usa y esta feliz, los usamos para nuestro ultimo viaje y le encantaron. Son súper cómodos y el color azul y celeste es precioso!!

I bought these headphones as a gift for my 9 year old stepsons birthday and he loves them. He has some sensory issues and we’ve had trouble finding him a pair of headphones that are comfortable for him. When he put them on to try them out his first comment was “THEY’RE SO COMFORTABLE!!”. We were so happy to hear that! He also loves the sharing port!

We have bought several different kinds of headphones of the mpow brand and love all of them. We bought these because we needed corded ones but we also have Bluetooth ones for the kids and noise cancelling ones for lawn mowing and fireworks. Love them all!
We received the headphones quickly. They are good quality and connect easily. It is not perfect sound quality, but pretty good for the price.
We got two of these and have only used them twice each and one already doesn’t work. The other one works fine still. So I’m not sure if I just got a dud but now I have to get a new pair for my son.

They are super soft and fit really well on my daughters head. There is a cushion on top that makes them comfortable for her to wear them for long periods at a time for school to do the distance learning. They seem pretty durable for being cheaper headphones. My daughters says the sound is pretty good but isn't noise canceling. I do like that they fold up so I can pack them into her bag for traveling. Overall I'd buy them again.

We purchased these for our 5-year-old son as he is going to kindergarten this year and is required to have a pair for school. They are comfy on his ears and he really enjoys being able to plug into his sisters headphones and listen to whatever she is listening to as she has a pair as well. Would recommend
Great for kids, and even adults with small minded heads.  Fits them just perfect.

Love that you can plug one headphone into the other so both my kids can hear the same movie. My oldest uses them for school and so far she loves them. Wish they had a mute button so it doesn't hot mic. Having to manually mute is a little annoying.

Received this today and everyone in the house is very happy. My 7 years old loved the headphones and my husband and I can finally get some peace. They look sturdy enough, very good quality and the sound is alright. Seems like finally my son will have headphones for a long time.

My boys are happy that they are so comfortable and they love the colors! We are excited about the multi-person use so they can share music when wanted. These are exactly what we needed for distant learning this year and I know they'll get lots of use for years to come!

My 3 year old son has had these headphones for about 3 months now. We love them, he can tune us out if he wanted. I love the fact that he can use them, fold them and access the volume by just the cord. They are perfect for small children, easy to maneuver, very easy to use and does not scratch easily. I also want to add that my son can be destructive at times. So the durability of these headphones has definitely been tested and they still look and work like new.
I bought these for my daughter for online school. She loves them and says the noise canceling is helpful to concentrate.
My 8 years old absolutely loves it. It doesn’t hurt his ears at all, with the others he always complained about this.

My son really likes these headphones. They fit his head well, the sound is good and the mic works well. I have put the headphones on myself and they fit me as well. There is also a headphone jack attached to his headphones which is a nice extra. I can plug mine into his and listen in his classes. Or all my sons plug into each others' sets and they can listen to the same thing! Good find!
Perfect fit for my almost four year old. She finds them comfortable. Win for the parents too so now we’re not having to hear her YouTube videos :)

These were a great deal and they work well for what we intended; headphones for school age kid and when they come home he uses them for his lil music player or when on the computer. I'd buy again if the price was right

These are great! Love the fun color. I like how you can limit the volume so you don’t hurt your little child’s ears. They fold down small. Great for traveling. I also love how you can use with another if the same pair and connect them together so two kids can watch same a show from a tablet if needed while in a plane etc. I have two and would buy again!
These headphones are great. Wonderful sound quality. Very durable for smaller aged children. The color is true to the real deal. I would buy these again.
My kindergartener loves these! They fit their head great and stay on. Sound quality is great.

These stopped working a month after we got them and the return window is closed. Very disappointedUpdate: seller immediately contacted me and sent a replacement free of charge. Excellent customer service

Just got these headphones for my daughter to use while doing online school. We haven’t used them much yet,  but they seem to be sturdy and comfortable. I like the volume control switch and the ability to connect another set of headphones. This seems like a perfect set of headphones for long trips (plane travel) where the kids get a little extra screen time.

Purchased these for my 1st grader's daily reading program at school and she loves them. The ear muffs are really soft and comfortable, and the adjustable band is great to achieve a snug fit. Great headphones for the price!
Bought these for our 16 month old to use during his first flight. They are comfortable and of great quality. Very impressed with this product.
My 3 and 6 year old love these. I tried them out and like that it has a max volume appropriate for kids. Love them.

So I see where it says the mic doesn’t work with “desktop computers”, but we don’t have a desktop, we have a chromebook and yet the mic doesn’t work.  Also, the sound only comes out of one ear, not both.  Waste of money, going to see if I can get a refund since these are definitely not what we need
We have had these for 1 day. One side of the headphones already does not work. And the plastic cord is already frayed in spots. Would not recommend or purchase again
My son says they are comfortable to wear and he can hear clearly without being distracted to outside noise
The black on the outside is so soft and smooth, the red padding for the top of your head is very thick and makes it very comfortable for kids to wear long time. Very happy with this item

I bought four of these for my classroom. I wanted a headphone that students would be comfortable using, had easy volume controls and was really interested in being able to connect with what they were hearing or have multiple students using one electronic device.They have been so great I bought two for my own kids at home.
Headphones are super cute! My 5 year old loves them. He uses the for virtual learning and gaming.
My kid use it for his online classes. I like the fact that the cord is not plastic. Nice color.
These have been great for our kids online learning. Like that there’s no need to pair them with a device, just plug them into the iPad and they’re good to go. Microphone seems to work well too.

My grandson loves these headphones, they are sturdy, the sound quality is good (I tested before giving them to him) and you can join other headsets for kids to share. I will be purchasing a couple more.Great idea for traveling.....
The head phones have a volume control , Great

Loved these headphones at first.. the quality seems great and durable for a 4 year old. However, both pairs that I have purchase broke out of no where. I had them folded and put away went to put them on my child and they literally broke in my hands. I bought 2 pairs and will not purchase again. I will say the volume, Sound quality, noise cancelling is great.. just the fact they keep breaking is the reason for my review and stars.
Needed headphones for distance learning zoom meetings and these work great! Kids love them. They are comfortable and durable.

I bought these headphones for my 2.5 year old for Christmas but decided to wait to gift them to him until his baby brother was born February 4, 2020. Much to my surprise upon taking them out of the box and plugging them into his fire tablet for the first time the sound went in and out constantly. Very disappointed and I missed the return window because I waited to gift them to him until he needed them for car rides after baby was born.
My toddler loves them, no complaints. Use them for trips and when mommy just can't listen to another kid song:)

Ordered this for my son who’s doing the virtual learning due to Covid-19. He likes them! We have his “school” set up in a quiet place to begin with but these help to really keep him concentrated. I recommend.
Our daughter really likes these headphones for use with her ipad at home and at school.  She has two pairs!  Recommend!

The Mpow headphones are kids friendly and easily operated by my kids.The cushion protects the kids ears when they have to wear it for a long time during the online classes these pandemic days..Kids can easily control the volume during their online sessions.Found these very useful and will recommend it to anyone.. Thank you

Comfortable, back ground noise greatly reduced, like that there is a microphone on it, and a noise reducer switch. Very good for kids virtually learning during the pandemic. Love it! Comes in a few colors to keep them separate for children.

Purchased to hear for my daughter and she loves them. Work great and I do not have to worry about them turning them up to loud. There is a button to choose two different sound levels. Also allows for multiple sets to plug into each other and only use a single headphone jack on a device. I would recommend bb
These work great for my kids' online learning needs. They love the colors and the fact they can hook them up to each other. They are comfortable and cute.
My son loves them and they have an additional port to plug in another set of headphones to listen in! Still a little loud for my liking but better than most headphones I've purchased for my kids.
Bought these for my 3rd grader's Virtual Learning school year and they are great! Comfortable, easy to adjust, great sound quality and volume control.
Great for our three year old. They’re a little big even on the smallest setting. Happy that they’ll grow with him

Bought 2 headphones so both of our daughters can listen to the same music/watch the same video at the same time, this is a great feature. It nicely fit their heads (they are 6 years and 9 years old), they use them for hours for their distance learning, lightweight and comfortable. The sound is clear and they sound clear on the other side of the chat. Nice design, good quality product.

Ordered these headphones for our 5 year old son to use for remote learning. They fit his head perfect and adjust easily. He hated wearing any other headphones because they hurt his ears but these are super comfortable and he can wear them for long periods and does not complain. He can listen and pay attention to what is going on with his teacher and not all of the noise in the house.
We had bought these 3 years back and now buying it again. These are excellent with kids with rough use who use it almost everyday now in quarantine.

Perfect for my 5 and 2 year old! We had a long flight and these headphones are very comfy. Just a little big on my 2 year olds head, but she’ll grow into them. Volume is good, not to loud. Glad I bought these.

These headphones work perfectly for my 5 year old daughter. She said they are comfortable, the band doesn't easily fall down and they are loud enough (there are two setting options for volume). We also have used the microphone attached and the audio sounds good. These are going to be great for virtual/remote school this year. Definitely recommend!

Bought them for a toddler while on road trips. He likes having them on, although he has taken them off and tried to twist them and expand/ retract them. This pair is a vibrant blue of what seems to be a durable plastic. The buttons seem to be a issue for young ones though as he pauses the movie and fiddles with the switch. Im sure this will get old after awhile and he will just leave it alone.

I love that it is noise cancellation and have a volume control to make sure it does not get too loud. The only thing I dislike is after one use the aux end bent randomly. The headphones still work but the aux point is now bent down.
Bought for my toddler son. He’s very pleased with it. Fits well, sound is ok. For the money, good purchase.

Great headphones. One pair has withstood 6 months, but most the most recent pair gave up the ghost in less than one month. I got a replacement and they are working fine.  I think these are great headphones overall. They really work great!

I got these for my 5 & 8.5 yo, they loved them at first. They are cute and comfortable for their small kid sized heads. The plug into each other option is great. I get it, I don’t want to damage my kids hearing, but they are way too quiet. My kids could barely hear when they were watching something on their kindle. I can’t imagine using them on a plane. No way would you be able to hear what you’re watching. I would not recommend. Honestly kind of useless if you can’t hear with them.

With 3 kids home virtual learning headphones were needed. I didn't think of it before school started because each one would be in a different room but I found that me walking around could be distracting. We got one pair of these to try it out on the one kid that needed it the most. They are exactly what we needed. She's 6. They fit her well. I love that the cord isn't wrapped in plastic but instead some thick cloth material. I tested the volume myself so I know they won't blow out their own eardrums. Mic works great. They are not a cheap pair of headphones. They are padded well for a child's head. The sound is on point. and it doesn't look like they'll snap in half the first time they open them up to put them on. So it's a win all around. Going to keep an eye out for other MPOW products now

I am a principal at  Kindergarten and 1st grade building.  We often have kids who don't have headphones for technology class and had bought many different ones to have as extras and none held up very well.  We decided to spend a little more and purchased a dozen of these headphones and they've lasted ALL year!  Most are used up to 6x per day for about 30 minutes at a time and the kids are pretty rough on them.  Again, they've all lasted all year long.  We plan to purchase some more so that teachers will have an extra set in their classrooms as well.  Highly recommend for parents who are looking to purchase a pair for their child as part of their school supply list as they are so durable.

Three stars because the sizong is wrong.  The oroduct states that it will fit uo to a 16-year-old, but it is too small for my 11-year-old thin daughter.  They barely fit my 9-year-old daughter.Otherwise, they are comfortable and work well.

My kids are obsessed with these headphones. They say the volume is great and they cancel out the other noises from the room. They are very comfy on their head/ears as well. I got them each a different color combination and they love the colors as well. I bought these with an amazon lighting deal- great value for this purchase!

Update: company sent out a new pair of headphones shortly after I posted the review. It has been about 6 months since then and the new pair have worked perfect every time. I updated my review to 5 stars. Excellent customer service!Original review: one star. Headphones constantly activate Siri, interrupting video playback. This causes the 4 year old to throw a fit.

So the good: comfortable for my 7 & 9yo for zoom. Decent sound quality.Con- unfair that the pink is more expensive. They both, but especially my blue one has poor mic quality. Helps to hold it up to your mouse.

Bought these for my 6 year old who is obsessed with gaming & music. So far, we’ve had these for well over 6 months and have no complaints! They work great & have held up in a house with a crazy one year old who ruins everything, so to me, they are worth it!

These work great & are perfectly sized for my smaller 8 yr old. They also expand & fit my head as well. Like the extra plug in so another child can plug into & listen along with w/ my child on their own headphones.

Bought these for my 8-year-old after many pairs wore out so quickly. These seem to be great quality and comfortable, I listened and they have great sound for a low-price optionUPDATE: Two months of having them, one side completely cracked and they are now useless

My daughter loves these headphones. The sound quality is good and they are super comfortable. She uses them mostly on trips so she often wears them for prolonged periods of time. I also have a Bluetooth headset by Mpow that is great and has held up to a lot of wear and tear. Great company.

I ordered 3 pairs, black/red, purple, pink for my 3 kids.It's only been a couple days but my kids are happy with them.  Sound quality is good and they are comfortable to wear.  One cool feature is that these headphones have a "share interface" which allows the headphones to be plugged into each other so all the kids can listen to the same thing without having to buy an adapter.

This was a gift for my son, he absolutely loved it. Lol he was definitely happy to play Fortnite without his sister bothering him lol the one thing I didn’t like was the inability to connect my daughters head phone with his. I believe she needs the same brand of head phones. But it’s not enough for me not to like it. Also it was provided with a 2 warranty which I loved. They even came a day early.They work fine with his Amazon fire tablet, Nintendo Switch and his IPhone!

My daughter's teacher bought here these as a gift. I asked her to borrow them to test them myself for this review. It is pretty good for kids. There's a switch on the mic area that allows you to choose between 85dB and 94dB. It also has a button where I am able to pause music and play again, double click and you can get to the next song. I called my mom to try out the mic, she said it isn't great but that she can hear me. I sent a few voice notes and it was okay quality. It is for kids and for that reason this is perfect.

Overall, they look pretty good for the price. They are a hair small for my son's ears but he won't be using them for extended periods of time so I think they will work just fine. Color looks like the picture, the padding is soft and for the price the quality is good.
these broke last month. i contacted customer service and put in a ticket. still haven't heard anything. i'm very displeased and i no longer recommend these for kids.

I purchased these for my 5 year old for our plane trip to grandmas. Although we have yet to try it out on the plane, we did a “home test” and he loves them. They fit comfortably, like the color, and the size of them. The sound is great and seems to drown out a lot of outside noise when he has them on. I like the two volume options, but a third would have been nice because both volumes seem to be at a high volume. But, I’m okay with that seeing that we will be on a plane.

I love that these were lightweight even in the packaging! I didn’t know what it was when they were delivered because I expected them to be bulky, but the box was so light. The colors are just a vibrant (as shows). My kids will love them when they see them. I know these are quality because I have a pair of wireless headphones (MPow Flame). Now I want a pair of overears for myself!

Got the MPOW headphones for my granddaughter going into kindergarten this year.  Two children in the house, so headphones definitely needed.  These are perfect for her!  They are wired because that’s what we wanted for her, have a volume control switch (great for a child that does not like loud noises), and have a sharing function!  Great purchase and couldn’t find comparable in store!
I have to say I am pleasantly surprised by this headphones. My expectations for the price were low. They sound very well, they cover my two year old's ear comfortably.

Was really impressed with these. I bought these for my 3 year old  and she’s rough with headphones! They fit her amazing. I wanted something with the grip on the headband part because her hair is so fine and everything normally slides off. The sound quality is Almost as good as my fiancé’s expensive gamer headphones! We’ve had them for about a month or so too.

I got 2 of these head phones. They work great by themselves. When you plug one into another to listen to the same thing, the one plugging into the other doesn't have the best volume. It's a fraction of what the sound should be. Still a great buy at the price and worth it.
Good choice for 6-7 year old children. Kidsare hard on headphones these have been doing well so far. Kids like the bright colors and the soft feel on their ears.

I wish I could give zero stars ⭐️ my sons head set broke!! I recently moved I don’t even remember if I kept them to return I got them end of 2018 & lasted about a year maybe less one side broke in a weird way it couldn’t be glued at all! Anyways I loved them at first my son did as well and I couldn’t find any warranty so I can’t even return now it sucks! Don’t buy😒
These were a gift bought from Amazon. They are amazing! They are high quality, the sound is great, and they fit my 5 year olds head PERFECTLY!

My 5 year old daughter thoroughly enjoyed her headphones. My only reason for deducting one star is bc they are not adjustable. My daughter often asks me to make them smaller, but they don't have that capability. However, from my perspective they seem to fit her head just fine.
My daughter loves these. Volume is sufficient. Very comfortable. Having an input jack so that another pair of headphones can attach and share sound is a neat feature.
Great fit for my 6 y/o.  Comfortable headband, very useful for online classes.

These are really awesome headphones for the price. My kids loved them! They feel great they don't feel cheap at all. The sound quality is great. We primarily bought them for my kids to use for online schooling. I bought 4 pairs still waiting on the last set to get here, which are blue and green. Love how they have so many different color options

Bought 4 of these headphones for my classroom. They look really nice and the earpiece is very soft and comfortable. The chord is just the right length so they don't become tangled and knotted (which is a huge problem with other headphones that we use). They are very compact when folded and are easy to store.
Son muy buenos y resistentes ideales para niños! Mi hijo los usa para la escuela

I bought these for my kid to wear for home school. They work amazing and he can focus on school work. They are also great for his iPad when he wants to watch shows that i don’t want to listen to for the 100th time. Highly recommend.

Brought these for my son and he loves them. The cord is extra long and they have a volume control switch and a button for the mic. Very easy to use.

Great quality headphones. I especially love the feature that allows me to plug my headphones in to hear what the teacher is telling my daughter to do without distracting my other learner. Have had these for two years. My daughter was two, now she’s 4 and they have held up to throwing, walking on, cord twisting etc. the top plastic is now cracked but they still work! Ordering another set! She loves them.

Love for my kids. Actually loud enough to hear but love option to turn down. Sturdy too.

These fit well, look great and were very comfortable but having researched for durability these broke after one week of my ASD child using them, owned for 10 days at that point. As I can't find the box I am probably stuck with these broken headphones which broke right before a 12 hr drive back home after vacation with 7 of us in the van. Not happy.
Seems like there is a mic attached, which is a plus
Perfect for kids!!!!

Update- Amazon sent us a replacement unit.  Its has the same issues.  Dont buy these headphones.  buy something elseMy son is having issues.  headphones delivered today.  When wearing them all of a sudden it will pause the video and/or Siri would come on.  I tried his headphones on my iPad and the same.  These are brand new.  7-18-2019
Keeps falling of head.

These are a waste of time if you have a video with low audio to begin with then you are out of luck you will hear nothing. Advice is the buy a regular pair of headphones and tell you kids not to touch the volume.

Ordered these for my 3 yr old. Fit was great, love the sound sharing feature. However sound only worked on one side, not both earphones. So I assumed, just a product defect.  I returned 1st pair and got a replacement 2nd pair.  2nd pair is ALSO defective. Sound comes through very distorted and shorts out on one side. Tested the sound device with other headphones and confirmed the problem was with these headphones. Not once, but twice!!! I do love this design and the idea of these for my son, I just wished they actually worked!!

Received item and only one side worked.  Returned to amazon.  Got a 2nd pair and the same problem except this time you could giggle the cord and it would work a little.  Returned this 2nd pair for a refund and chose a different pair.  Just FYI we tired them on multiple devices so it was not a device issue.

Had to return them right away because it was defective. Only one ear worked. Second pair came in the mail & worked fine for about a week. Now one of the ears is REALLY low, you can barely hear anything from that side. Will be returning once again
Headphone jack BROKE OFF inside my iPad! The piece that broke got stuck inside. I managed to get it out, but what a piece of junk. Almost cost me my iPad. Buyer, beware!
Purchased for 1st grade in classroom use. They lasted almost 2 months, now sound is distorted and only coming from 1 side. Don’t waste your money.
Very comfortable and it sounds clear.
I liked the design and look of it as also the cord
Surprisingly good quality at an affordable price
Works good and looks good. My brother loves them
Awesome could use it for computer
Very solid product
My 6yo loves these for his distance learning!
Sound was incredibly low. Would not be able to hear anything even with very low background  sounds. Very disappointed.
ear pieces too small. Not over the ear for my average sized 2 year olds ears. Sent back
Works well
Great love them!
I only received one set of headphones!

My autistic 4year old absolutely loves these headphones. The cord is plastic which is so nice prevents breaking and knotting...they fit comfortably around his ears...love that there's a volume switch on the cord so that I can turn it down without having to touch his tablet.

These were a godsend. They fit our toddler (21 month old) really well and she enjoyed using it on the plane. The sound quality is great. Some people worry about it getting too loud but we didn’t find this to be a problem at all. The cushions on the earpieces and the top of the headband were super comfy and soft. The aux cable can be plugged in to either side of the headphones so that was nice, too. They also fold up so you can stow them easily! The color is super cute and our toddler loved using it on our 3 hour plane ride. We are so so so happy with these!!!*One tip I would share (if your kids don’t use headphones) is to have “training” sessions for five or so minutes daily prior to a long trip like ours so your baby can get used to it. Our toddler doesn’t watch much TV or use electronics. This meant we had to kind of teach her how to use headphones and the concept of them needing to stay on.

I was excited to see a newer model as we already have a pair that has lasted 2 years (including being at school for an entire year). I wanted to have a pair for home and school but this one -- (tested on ipad, iphone and pc) simply doesn't work. it doesn't pick up voice tracks. it picks up the loudest music tracks which are garbled at best. I'm really disappointed as the headphones themselves are comfy, and from our past experience i know can be quite durable.---UPDATE---8/26/19---

I hate to not give these guys a good review because I actually love the product (well my kids love them).  The feel like they are well made and the fit nice, sound good enough and they have a built in mic.  That's all great and we had 2 pairs that worked fine for about a year....  1 pair failed a few months ago (less than a year owned) and after contacting their support, they were out of stock so refunded my money.  Figuring I got a lemon and got good responsive and fair customer service, so no big deal.Fast forward to today and now our 2nd (older) pair have also failed!  Luckily they have a 24 month warranty (which is fantastic compared to others) and while I'm happy with their response it's the same situation, e.g. out of stock so how about a refund? Normally this would be fine but because everyone is buying this item now the price has gone from $13 to $25 due to price gouging.  I am happy they are honoring the warranty but 2 bad pairs speaks to very poor build quality.  Maybe I got unlucky but buyer beware.

Update again: Six months after purchasing these, the right side speaker has died. Not too bad considering they are used often in the classroom, but not great. They are physically holding up and are still very comfortable, but my daughter won’t use them anymore since she can only hear out of the left side.Update: I stand somewhat corrected. When my daughter’s teacher gave me the headphones the next day after telling me they were broken, it appears my daughter had chewed them! So, that is why they stopped working and is not the fault of the headphones themselves, per se. However, the wire provided on the pink headphones is a faux leather plastic that is easy to chew, bend, pinch, etc. It isn’t durable and won’t last long for most kids. The one plus on this cord is that it is removable and therefore replaceable.

Works well for kids. My kids drive me crazy in the car with their iPad sounds so I purchased 3 of these for some Dad sanity.In the past I would give them ear buds but the would crank them up and I feared they would damage their hearing.

We purchased these for my son's upcoming remote school year -- hoping that they would limit the volume level as promised.... they do not.I tested these with numerous devices -- on my PC, on a samsung phone, and on a chromebook.  We cranked the audio up with each one of these and tested it.  It doesn't limit the audio - actually hurt my ears lol  Sure the sound sounds pretty good -- but if you're purchasing this to ensure that your little ones don't blast their ears.... I'd try a different brand.

I was surprised when I first opened the package. I was expecting cheap looking headphones especially for the price I paid but instead found these gorgeous looking headphones. The headphones have a rubberized texture to them making them look and feel more expensive. The ear pads are very soft and comfortable and I love the braided cable. I wasn't expecting much in terms of sound quality but when i tried them out I was surprised they actually sounded good. As a musician I’m used to listening to $100 and up headphones. But these don't sound like cheap headphones at all. I would say they have similar sound to Apple Airpods. The headphones have a warm and airy sounding tone to them nothing like I was expecting at all for headphones in this price range and especially headphones for kids because who would make high quality sounding headphones for kids right? They don’t know what good quality sound is. I also love that they fold. Highly recommended!

I love these headphones and so do my kids. You can tell they are made heavy duty, smooth material and has cushion where it sits on the head. The EarPods are nicely cushioned and feels great when on, even for long period of time. The sound is great because it has two decibles. It can also be used as noise canceling which makes the sound even better. The cord for the headphones are heavy duty. You can tell they are not cheaply made. The button where the mic is can be used to pause and play. It also comes with a jack input for music/sound sharing. I also love that I don’t have to worry about my kids hearing with these as they come with a volume limit max. The sound quality  in these are great! Great color options too. I needed these for my kids online schooling. These are perfect. They also come with 2 year warranty! Love it!

These were great for my 4 and 8 year olds on a recent plane ride. Forced them to share one device so I had less to carry but work individually when they are doing their own things. They said they were comfortable and I love that they limit the volume to protect their little ears.

There were perfect little headphones for my 3 year old.  Softly cushioned and easy to use, he actually doesn't mind wearing these headphone versions some of the other ones we've attempted.  These are comfortable little solutions to your headphone problems.  The volume control is reassuring, knowing that he's not going to damage his ears this young.  The extra jack allowed me to connect on a regular headphone to check on his volume and content.  It's not perfect noise cancelling by any means, which is good when I need to get his attention, but it does reduce the sound so we can use it as ear protection sometimes since he's willing to wear it  And it's so affordable that I got a second pair to throw in the car.  I would recommend this over some of the cutesy ones that aren't as comfortable.

“They were great at first but one month after we bought them one pair headphone completely died for no reason.  Now we can’t return them because there a set and we are just outside of the  return window 🙁”After I posted my original review the company contact me and sent me a replacement headphone for free.  I really appreciate them going out of their way for us and I’m hopeful that the headphones continue to work properly. I do really like that you can link the headphones together it’s wonderful when you have two children that want to share one device.

Perfect fit for my petite 5 year old.  With Distance learning in full effect (thx covid19).. we needed a nice set of headphones that would be cute, comfortable and produce good audio quality but not break the bank.  So far so good with the MPOW CH6s.  I got on a virtual meeting with her to test out the quality and these are pretty hard to beat for the price you pay, no need to hold the inline mic upto her face to hear clear crisp audio..  Added bonus, there is a toggle on the mic to switch between 85dB and 94dB for those of you concerned with the volume level.  Would have liked a volume control there as well but that's not really a show stopper here and actually may be easier to maintain proper volume levels for her anyway (less things to fidget with).  Id recommend this product for your little one.

We tested these on her chromebook through zoom and they worked great. The audio was crystal clear on both ends!! The microphone seems to pick up any background noise or voices. Great if you're worried about the mic picking up your voice without having to hold it close to your mouth, not great if you don't want your kid's entire class hearing you yell at the cat or the music you're playing in the background. But I think the important thing is the mic works very well.Other reviewers said that the cord comes loose from the headphones. The one we have is not removable. I don't have to worry about it being pulled out acidentally getting lost.

Remote schooling video lessons were riddled with screeches and shouts of excited children.  Gaaaah! I saw these headphones featured on Lovely Lucky Life as a good Easter basket gift. So in the Amazon cart they went! So far we are happy. Folding feature is great for stashing headphones in a basket. Two different levels of noise cancellation, a built in microphone, silky soft padded earpiece and buttery smooth (and wipe able) silicone like coating. The biggest plus for me is that you can Daisy chain these and plug into one device. Volume control is done on the device you’re plugged into by the primary headphone wearer. My kids listen to books on CD once a week with these as well as some Zoom/Meet calls twice a week. Still holding up well, even after being tossed about.

Update: The seller's customer service team reached out to me and sent a replacement set of headphones. So good on them for trying. However, they were exactly the same as the pair we'd received the first time. The box, the documentation inside the box, and the headphones themselves make NO MENTION of having a microphone, and no microphone is detectable on any of the devices we tried them on. It would seem that the seller is confused about the actual capabilities of these headphones. But, again, applause for good effort from customer service.Ordered these exclusively because we needed kids' headphones with a microphone for my daughter's online school. Although the Amazon description indicates in MANY places that there is a microphone, the headphones that came didn't have any discernible microphone, nor did the box or any of the documentation they came with mention a microphone in any way. We tested on multiple computers and none could detect a microphone. It would appear that either the listing is incorrect or we've received the wrong product. Returning immediately. If you're looking for headset with a microphone, don't buy these.

My daughter loved these headphones and gently used them once per week for about 6 months, prior to the COVID shutdown. They were stored in a bag and kept at school. We just went through her school supplies from last year (after getting them back from her school this summer) and they don't work. There is a crackling sound, the audio cuts in and out and you need to turn the volume on her Chromebook up all the way just to hear anything. We just bought new MPOW headphones for my son and the difference between the two is night and day. Hoping the new ones last longer than these did... didn't expect to buy a new pair every school year. Would suggest taking out an extended replacement warranty if you choose to purchase. Wish I did!

Compared the the Noot K11 headphones, these feel and sound more like toys than real headphones. The Noot ones have a more flexible band that allow all ages to use them comfortably, and have very good sound with deep base. These Mpows have very little base, and are a bit tight for older kids, and not really usable by adults.I do like the 45 degree angle plug on these - I'm thinking that may be more survivable - our last pair of Noots died due to the plug being yanked to the size and broken. The volume control is nice. It would be good to be able to lock it into the lower setting though, or at least make it easier to see when it's on high with a red indicator or something.

I bought these for my 4 year old and he loves them. The material is durable and I like that the cord is braided so it doesn't fray. It folds into a very portable size for easy storage when he isn't using them and will easily fit in his backpack when we travel. I would definitely recommend that you purchase these for a kid! We had a pair of Sony wired on-ear headphones prior to this and they are beat up. I don't anticipate these looking as rough after 3 months of use. I gave it a 4 out of 5 because I don't think the volume limit works very well. When we unplugged his headphones, the volume was VERY high.

These headphones are top notch.  The build quality and materials are all high quality.  The detachable cord is great, when my daughter snags the cord it pulls right out.  The ability to share audio via headphone jack is also a plus, both my daughters can watch the same show with their headphones and not need an (easily lost) audio splitter.  I’m a huge fan of mpow almost every headphone is my house is mpow.  They make great stuff.

I bought these in pink, for my 7 year old, & they fit her perfectly, right out of the box. They look just like the picture, and arrived with a braided cord! I LOVE that if you have another pair, you can plug one set into the other, so both kids can listen to the same thing, at the same time. Saves on buying a splitter or extra cords, etc. Also, I love that there is an option to raise the decibel level, for noisier environments, but also can be kept at a lower level for regular use. I tried them on myself, and they even fit me, so they are truly great for all ages! And they really cancel out a lot of noise. They fold easily for travel, and appear to be great quality, at a great price. I bought another pair in black/blue, for my 5 year old. We love these headphones!

My 5 year old granddaughter was imitating me when she saw me listening to iTunes on his laptop.  She took her pink earmuffs and a piece of string and made believe she was doing the same as me.  I bought these in pink  as a surprise for her and when my daughter called, I took the headphones and plugged them into my phone and she talked to her mother.  You can never pay enough for the smile of a grandchild.  The sound quality is perfect for her and they extend a bit so if I need to use them for a conference call, I won't mind wearing pink headphones (at home!)

Soooo glad I bought these for a 5 and 2 year old before our last flight. Made the trip a million times easier. At this great of a price and seemed of good quality, product can't be beat. No problems with the headphones themselves. And I could even connect the two pair to listen to the same device. After about two weeks of solid use we've had, so far, smooth sailing. Even if they broke tomorrow I'd buy another pair immediately. 5 stars through and through

I bought these to use with my children aged 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12. I was really hoping they would fit the younger children well, and I was not disappointed! The kids think they are comfortable and, honestly, they can even expand to fit my adult head. Not only that, but they also fit my 1-year-old. So that was a pleasant surprise. I love the feature that we can connect multiple sets together. The kids love to listen to audiobooks, and I have a small cheapo mp3 player that I have loaded some books on to. Now what I need is 4 more sets of these headphones. Maybe in different colors. ;)

These are the cutest ever and work so great for my twins. surprisingly they both fought over the pink ones, so it might be nice to offer a set of pink and set of blue. we love them, and they are appropriate to the age of an 8 yo at least!

4th pair of headphones for 2 and 4 year old. Finally found a pair that fit both of their heads. They are very petite with small heads, so every pair I found was way too big, even for my 4 year old. These are GREAT quality. They stay on their head, have great sound quality with a kid setting for volume and a switch (great for when you're on an airplane and it is way too loud for the kid volume setting). They thought of everything with these headphones. The cushions are very supportive and soft as well. Fun colors. Very happy!

I have three girls and am currently working half of the day from home due to COVID. These allow them to be able to be in the same room with me without compromising any phone calls that I may have to take. It's even better on road trips!! If the girls want to watch the same thing or listen in on the same device, all they have to do it plug in to their siblings headphones. I purchased three but will be purchasing a 4th set for my nephew who frequently visits our home.

perfect headphones for school tech class! My girls loved the added butterfly on top. And it helps them know which ones are theirs in the sea of buds and black headphonesUpdate -- these have all stopped working! They worked one minute and then the next - just stopped. Super bummed. The first pair stopped pretty soon after purchasing. The second pair stopped about 18 months after purchase. Wish we could get them fixed or exchanged because my kids love them and they are comfortable for them!

These seem to be nice, sturdy headphones.  They fit my kids well and are adjustable so I can use them on my three year old and my seven year old.  The ear pieces are nice and soft and do well at keeping the noise out.  The sound is nice and clear and I love that they can be hooked together.  I bought three pair so my kids can listen to things all together.  My kids love the bright colors and I like that they fold up so it is less likely the headband will get broken in storage.  The microphone works great too.  The only thing I wish they would change is to let you lock the volume either to the safe DCB or to control it to any volume, like regular headphones.  But these are great headphones at a reasonable price.

I'm honestly not sure if we received a malfunctioning pair or if they are all like this. We ordered them so our daughter can do her school work during our upcoming trip. While we were testing them they unfortunately started making siri pop up and then shortly after it was making her music play. Originally I thought my daughter was pressing the button on the headphones by accident but after some investigation and trying it out myself it was the headphones doing it on its own.

The good: They’re cute. The colors are pictured well.  My kids each picked a different color. They seem to work well. One of the three we ordered ended up being delayed by about a week.  But they were overnighted and we received them in time for the first day of online learning!  Thank you so much for that.The con: The delayed headphones (light purple) had a dime-sized blob of GOOP on the ear cushion.  It wasn’t excess glue. Luckily, hubby was the one unboxing it and swiftly wiped the blob of gloop off.  (I would have just returned them immediately and had to deal with a disappointed 2nd grader). So...just be on the lookout when opening the product box!!!

Purchased two sets of these headphones for my kids as they head back to school for virtual learning with their computers. Wanted them to have headphones with microphones so that they can hear and be heard during their live meeting sessions. My kids love the colors. They say they are comfortable to wear and like the function that allows them to chain their headphones together when they might want to listen to something together on one of their ipads. All in all please with the quality and the price of these headphones. We are just starting in on the school year tomorrow, so hopefully these will hold up for the school year.

Got these for my kindergardener for virtual school. Hello 2020. They work very well and the volume limit is great for the kids, but too low for me to use. I didn't realize that they have a cushion on the top of the head- that was a nice surprise. they adjust very well and my son loves them. i just wish it had a microphone and a mute button. The switch that is on it is for answering phone calls and for controlling a music player. For the money I spent I am very happy.

They worked ok for awhile. The volume was never loud to begin with but I think that was because of the noise safety feature. Anyway, we bought these in May, and by July they only worked half the time. You’d plug it in the jack and had to turn it just right to get it to work. Not fun when you have a wiggly 3 year old who kept moving the cord and having the sound cut out again and again. Then we tried again on a trip in October and after awhile the sound cut out completely. These were only used 7-8 times total and now they’re completely broken. Only reason I’m giving them even 2 stars is because the durability (in terms of them not cracking) is great. Just wish they actually worked for more than 2 months.

I am not using these myself. Bought for my kids who are doing school online. So far they are woking great. No issues with volume. Both kids want to take them off after a couple hours of wearing them because their ears get sore. I think this happens with all headphones. They need a screen break by then anyway! I can't say anything about the sound quality. I am pleased with my purchase.

Update: the company sent a new pink headphones out and they do work better. The volume control for a child is satisfactory. The headphones are a little fragile still though as the blue headphones continue to come apart. We have been using these since August so they’ve had some rough adventures.The volume is very quiet. They are very fragile and will break easy. Not bad for the money we used on the plane to Florida and worked good for the trip but after the pink broke.

These are so cute!  They are super comfortable and adorable.  I bought them for one of my kids to do their school work during "the pandemic" so I wouldn't have to hear EVERY SINGLE THING the teachers were teaching.Sound cancellation is excellent - maybe a little bit TOO GOOD.

In my original review I gave one star because of issues I had with product. However I contacted customer service and Laura was super helpful with the issues I had. She walked me through making checks of the headphone to verify the issue was not on our part. With this being said she went through and informed me that since the product was within warranty etc they would be shipping out a new device to me. It took a bit longer than expected but I had anticipated that with the current happenings. She even emailed me to let me know that (i)the item had been shipped as well as (ii) the anticipated arrival date and (iii) verifying with me to see if device was working. The fact that they were not rude and obnoxious as other customer service agents at other entities have been for other products. They will get my business again as to me it shows they care about the customer. We are wrapping up week two of using this device no issues this far.

Seems to be made out of rubbery-er material than i expected, which is actually better for kids.  My daughter bends them and twists them around and they seem to be holding up to the abuse.  Only down side is that since these are on the bigger side they don't pack easily since the ear pieces don't fold in like my wireless head phones, in case you want to bring them somewhere.  Also the wire is reinforced where it connects to the headphones which is a good thing since apparently my daughter uses them as a part time lasso.

***UPDATE *** THE SELLER SENT ME A NEW HEADSET AND ITS WORKING GREAT!!  I must have got a dud the first try!  I have updated this review to 5 stars. My son moves it.  Thank you for taking it apon yourself to make sure i got a working product right away!!  Old review:  I bought this because my 2 year old likes to watch our Alexa Show and I needed to reduce the volume.  These headphones do nothing to reduce the volume I can hear the music from another room when they have the volume turned up.  There is no limiting happening. He loves turning the volume full blast and this was supposed to limit the volume  IT DOESNT.  I wish I could find the cheap $5 set I purchased before  they did the trick

Size does not fit a child. Bought these for our daughter for our upcoming flights. Unfortunately we didn’t test them before our trip but They are heavy and when she looks down at the iPad they fall forward on her face because 1 they are too big for a child even though they are advertised for children and 2 the design is bulky and heavyShe was so frustrated with them and we ended up not being able to use them.

I ordered a Pink set and a Black/Red set for my 3 year old daughter and my 7 year old son and they love these.They fit their heads great, the volume limiting knob is great because at home they use the switch on the 85db limit and in the car or on a plane they can use the 94db limit.

I bought these for my 7.5-year-old daughter. I tried them out myself and tested the noise cancellation by having my mother speak at me. I couldn't hear a thing she was saying while I had music playing on the headphones. They're extremely comfortable too. I just wish they offered a pouch to put them in. She will be using these on her iPad for remote learning. I'm very satisfied with my purchase. Will buy again in the future.

Pretty impressed with these. I ordered one for my son for back to school. He hasn't really used them that much but did test them out. He couldn't hear me talking when he had them on and he said that the sound quality was pretty good. I would like to see how the microphone functions and how they play out in a month or so but so far, happy with my purchase. My son is 6 years old and the fit was perfect when extended.

Purchased these for virtual school b/c they appeared to be durable and the product title clearly stated the product included a microphone. Despite being advertised that way, we received a product that did not, in fact, have one. We did not know this until the first day of school when our daughter was unable to participate and meet her classmates because the product is not as advertised. Upon further inspection of the box, we saw that it advertises all the associated features of the product...but microphone wasn't one of them. The listing MUST be changed to reflect the actual features of the product. These may be great for sound, but don't use them to rely on anyone to hear you speak.

I was surprised this headset was made well for kids. I bought this for my 6yr old son to use when he watches movies on the coach over his tablet while we watch ours on big tv. It works well on him, and the best feature it has is volume management. It will not damage the kids ears. it has 2 db setting which both output well enough without over volume. My son would not accidentally over pump the volume as the final output is limited. Its a great buy!

We were using another pair of headphones for kiddo for a few years so it was time for an upgrade. She really likes them. Says they are comfy & she can hear well at the 85 level. Haven’t tried the microphone out yet, but I think it will work well for virtual school. The headphones have plenty of room for growth too. They fit her head & I can wear them which is great when checking volume.

***update***So I originally said they were sturdy but she hasn't used them in a few months and used them the other day, accidentally dropped them and they broke. We've already had one replaced. She's not hard on them and barely uses them. I'm off to purchase a different pair.

As school has moved online for a lot of school districts, I needed something to help curb the noise level of the my kids different school classes and online learning applications. I came across these after seeing many of the reviews, and given their price, I felt like it was a good price point I could test them out on.I couldn't be happier. They are good quality for kids headphones, they have mics so they can interact on their online classes, the volume control has decimal limitation so they can't get too loud for the children ears. And finally the fact that they can daisy chain connect to have multiple headphones listen to the same audio source was a very welcome and pleasant surprise.

I have been really impressed by these headphones.  For the price, I wasn't expecting much, but I've been impressed so far.  We've only had them for a few days but they are not flimsy at all and seem to be really well made.  Maybe there is hope that the little monsters won't destroy them in a month or three.  The integrated microphone picks up their voices just right, the sound is clear, and the ability to link them is awesome (it wasn't something I was specifically looking for, but it is very cool).  The only thing I would change about them is to move the volume control switch to somewhere on the headset where it is less obvious to the kids who love to fidget with everything and believe that louder is always better.

Due to the forced online schooling this year, we have lots of google meet calls. My 10 yo does not like the headsets, but we still needed something for her calls. These headphones are just right! she is so often uncomfortable and miserable with headphones, but these ones she loves! She gets on her calls each morning confident that these headphones will work. They are super comfortable, the sound is great and having a built in microphone is perfect!

I have a small head and they pinch my ears.  My 6yo has an abnormally large head and complains about them pinching his ears after an hour or two.  Sound is good.  Noise cancellation is acceptable.  Price was good.  I LOVE the extra jack on the ear piece. I have to listen in on most of his online classes (because he's only 6) so the extra jack is used daily. Glad I got these.

My kids love these headphones, if something happens to them, I would buy more!!! I might even buy as gifts. They are super soft on the top of head and around the ears. Fits my younger and older kids. They plug into each other's headphones and watch the same show on a kindle together. They love it! Super happy with the color choices too. They also fold up for easy storage in a backpack, ect. Highly recommend.

I got these for my kids for a trip so they can use it on the plane. My son, who usually won't keep anything on his ears for more than 3 mins actually used these for the entire flight when he wasn't asleep, so I know that they're comfortable. I also tested the sound level at max volume and the limiter it excellent. I don't have to worry about my kids cranking up the volume to unbearable decibels. I also find the cushioning quite comfortable.  And tangle-free cords are a dream when trying to manage 2 young kids on a plane and bags. I highly recommend this product.

This is the second headphone we have from mpow, with the first one still functioning after almost 2 years with our son.  It fits his head really well and the ear padding is comfortable.  Yes there are cheaper headphones in some stores, but we really like the quality of the first one we bought so we got again from this brand. We have not tested the other functionality and I don't think my son will need to fiddle with it.

Update: Mpow provided me a full refund, and also offered to replace these, so upgrading to 3 stars --- but you should know that if volume limiting is a concern these might not be good for younger kids.These headphones are way too loud, even on the 85dB setting.  Not suitable for smaller children!

I purchased these headphones for school in the blue and aqua for my 9 yr old son and 6 yr old daughter. They are super comfortable! The sound quality is better than any other pair of headphones we've owned. Easy to adjust the volume and overall they are great quality. I'm thinking about purchasing a second pair for home.

Comfortable headset , good sound quality for the price.  Microphone is on the wire, so the one downside is that if you are moving when talking, the microphone picks up the sound of the microphone rubbing against your shirt, making it hard for the other party to hear clearly.  When talking I have to hold the microphone away from my chest.

My 6 year old is using this for remote schooling while his 5 year old sister is remote in the same room.  These are very comfortable and do a great job canceling our noise.  The ability to port another headphone set is very useful.

Good headphones for the price! The dB level adjustment is great! We ended up getting  three of these. We love these headphones because they connect directly to each other, first one to fire tablet with dB set low then the other two plugged into each other with dB set high to compensate for volume loss when using multiple headphones. Quality seems good but time will tell if they hold up to the kids!

I purchased two pairs of these for my 6-year old twins when our schools closed down in March due to Covid-19. They finished out their kindergarten year and have been using them throughout the first three months of 1st grade and they are absolutely awesome! My kids are, as any parent of a 6-year old can attest to, a little rough on their belongings, but these have help up extremely well. The cords are sturdy and the material that goes over the head is durable, and folds for easy storage when we're done for the day. I would buy these again in a heartbeat, but it seems like I won't need to!

It was purchased for my son to use at school. It was used minimally at school during their tech time under supervision so it was not used rough at all (only sitting at his table less than two hours a week for 3.5 months). It stopped working on one side so he brought it home and while I was checking it out, the connection was bad so it would only come out on one side. I had a chat with amazon and was told they only offer a 45 day warranty (which should have been a red flag that I missed). Pay 4 more bucks and get another product that offers a 1+ year warranty.

My son is obsessed!!!!! He loves these! And mommy love them too. They are very good quality. They have great sound and actually pretty good noise cancelling. They match his Amazon fire kids tablet! And he just looks so cute with them on!Update: we have had these for 7-8 months now and they are still perfect. They can handle a 2 year old little boy. Buy them.

They are great for kids. I appreciate the fact that if my kids chew on the cord I don’t need to worry abt them getting bad chemicals like a lot of electrical equipment has. Wish you could buy the pink headphones individually like you can the blue. My youngest insists on pink. Other then that I have no complaints they do what there supposed to do.

I bought these for my daughter as she is starting school remotely due to the COVID. These are the perfect size, fold up nicely for storing, and very obviously noise cancel as I have to say her name a few times before she hears me. Ha! An added bonus is the ability to connect another set of headphones or earbuds. Very pleased with these so far!

Depending on what you are listening to, these are not volume limiting! For example u tube videos (educational for distance learning) are VERY loud. You cannot just let your young children move from video to video without testing the volume on each. These DO go higher than the stated decimals. This is fraud and dangerous. DO NOT trust these w little ones ears!

I brought two of these for my 3 year old and 5 year old. They are adjustable so fits both of them. They love it and we love it because its nice and quiet now and I dont have to hear their tablets anymore, or them bickering because both of thier tablets are blaring at the highest volume. The sound is limited but loud enough for them. Works pretty well with the fire tablets. I highly recommend to other parents.

Very plasticky. The head band snapped on our first car trip.They are pretty and comfy, but not very durable. Good for supervised environments like your living room. Not a minivan full of kids. Not sure what I was thinking.

These headphones are great. The cord is short so you won't trip on it or get it too tangled. The volume is spot on. The one thing that I LOVE is that you can daisy chain these headphones together and hear the same thing without s splitter. I had no idea and it's perfect. My kids can watch a movie on the Ipad and plug in 1 headphone.

You will be very impressed by these headphones. Especially for only 20 bucks. Purchased August 10th 2020. They are not just for kids they fit my head fine too... I'm a small guy but there's still lots of room. Unless you have big ears. Anyway, the microphone is the best part since there's no stick or stem there's just a little hole inside the ear piece. And it picks up my voice very well  during phone calls. They are comfortable and the quality is impressive, even the cord has a thick soft lining around it.

The sound quality is fair.  I would recommend this for children 6-14.  The padding is very soft and comfortable.  The ability to connect another headphone to this is an added bonus for when kids need to share one tablet or other devices.In the photo, you can see the difference between the CHE1 (blue accent) and the CHE6 (green accent).  The CHE6 is an OVER-the-ear design while the CHE1 is an ON-ear design.

This is the 3rd set of headphones I got for my little son.  He wrecked the other 2 in less than 2 days, pulling the cord apart, getting it tangled.  These are still going strong, and he loves them. The curve is tight, so it stays on his ears real snug.  Also the cord is super strong.  He drags his leap pad around while still plugged in, but the cord doesn't get stretched out or broken.  Great for a rough little boy.

Ok so these are good but depends on your computer for the microphone. We’re having trouble syncing them with my kids’ brand new ASUS laptops but of course it works just fine on my husband’s 11 year old MacBook. So yes there is a microphone but it’s hard to sync it up. If that makes sense. I know a lot of reviews say no microphone but there is. Other than that frustration, these work as described.

Love these! Perfect for my nearly 3 year old for his birthday,  we tested the fit and sound quality and now he doesnt want to let them go,  fit snug and comfortable on his head. Don't come with any type of case like other brands do which is kindof a let down. Snap fold,  and my faveorit part! Cord is removable! So he can just run around playing with them without tripping o choking,  they do NOT do bluetooth she the cord is removed like some other brands but I'm find with all that for the price. Very satisfied.

We bought two of these for our kids for a family vacation. The volume limit switch is awesome to ensure they don't go too loud in normal use but can still hear their show whole on a plane. The fit my kids (aged 3 & 5) great with plenty of room to grow. I can almost for in them, and I wear a size L/XL hat, so that's saying something about the size take. They don't match the sound quality of my Sennheiser headphones, but given their price I'm happy with them.

Purchased for my son to use in school. I'm very impressed by the quality of the headphones. The padding is soft and comfortable and cancels out a lot of exterior noise. I like that you can choose which decibel maximum you'd prefer, although I wish it were a little lower. I also like the length and durability of the cord. Overall, the price is great and I will definitely purchase again if needed.

Noise control is great, but my five yr old figured out how to shut it off. It fits him just fine. I like that more headphones can piggyback from it, so I can listen in as he does his work if needed, or a sibling can watch a movie with him and both have headphones, or even more kids. I bought these for him to take back and forth to school, but I think I’ll get another pair for his brother.
*****UPDATE******Both headphones stopped working. They did not last even 5 months. We were very pleased at first but now are bummed and will not be purchasing this brand again. Very disappointed.

I bought these for my 5 year old daughter for school and she loves them. They fit her perfectly and she said they have very comfy. My 8year old son loved them so much too that i had to order him a pair as well! They fold up nicely and have the ability to pause the video or music from the tablet/computer. Great headphones for the price! Would recommend!

I bought these a few months back when we were still flying places to keep my sanity on solo cross country flights with him.. My 2 year old loves them. I don't know how good the sound quality is, but I don't think he's much of an audiophile just yet. He mostly watches cartoon on an iPad with these and they work great! The blue is super fun too!

I have bought my son a few pairs of kids headphones but none of them fit his head properly as they are too big even though they are meant for kids.  These fit him well and seem comfortable for him.  I like the volume limits as I know he isn't going to hurt his ears.  He is only 4 years old and is really rough on stuff, that hasn't been a problem with these as they seem to be extremely durable.  One happy mama with this purchase.
My daughter likes these. She keeps them on for hours... literally! She wears glasses and others hurt her ears. These finds these very comfortable and glasses friendly!Buy them!

Bought these for my daughter for online school. She’s out in our main room & was super distracted. Found these headphones & she’s been using them ever since. They help her focus with the noise cancellation & she is able to do her school & no worry about other things going on- they are amazing! Highly recommended!

These are so great, my daughter can no longer hear me when I call her name while watching her iPad. My daughter is 9 and drags these things everywhere we go. These have been dropped, the wire has been tangled and pulled and they have held up. She has gone through 4 other brands of headphones before these. These have definitely stood up to the tests that others could not. Definitely worth the buy!!! I highly recommend.

Purchased these for my son for back to school. They are both comfortable and durable. Love that they are volume limiting to protect his hearing while providing clear sound quality. He uses them with a chromebook at school and they have been absolutely perfect. They are definitely a great value and worth the money.

These headsets seen really well made and are comfortable for my child. They are the perfect two shades of blue but unfortunately, the built in microphone simply does not work. I bought these specifically for this feature because of virtual schooling now and they need to talk and hear from headset. Very disappointed - will be returning.

My kids are doing online classes due to the current 2020 issues, so we got these headphones for them to use with their Chromebooks for class.  Now they can both attend their own classes at the same time without distracting one another, even though they are sitting in the same room physically.  Very helpful.

Having two kids "homeschooling" has not been easy. But the simplest solution was getting a Mpow CH6S Kids Headphones with Microphone - now my daughter hears the teacher and her teacher hears her clearly distraction-free and she says they are comfortable.Recommended for anyone with kids remote learning

I purchased these headphones twice now for my kids to use during virtual learning. The feature that I like best isn’t even discussed much in the details. I like that I can plug another set of headphones in to hear what is happening at any time and not disturb their own listening.The built in microphone is clear and they are comfortable so far for them.

I've had bluetooth MPOW headphones for years for myself and loved them, so I was thrilled to find a child version now that my 6-year-old has to do NTI due to the pandemic. These are comfy, and even when I turned my phone up to full volume, they didn't overmodulate or become too loud, so these seem to be limiting the sound just fine without loss of quality. Only thing I wish all headphone manufacturers would do is make the "R" and "L" more prominent. I'll likely have to put a sticker on these so she knows which side is which.

I bought these headphones for my 4 year old son. It's hard to find a comfortable pair for a kid that actually fits their small head. He loves them and they fit great. They adjust large enough for an average adult, or small enough for probably a 3 year old. The cord is nice and flexible and wrapped in fabric, and the extra plug for sharing audio is nice when him and my daughter want to watch the same thing at the same time.

Great quality 2nd set we got for our 6yo first set worked so well it became his school set and needed another one from home tried a lot of wireless ones that fell apart the cord is good quality as are the head phones 4 stars on the noise cancellation and sound quality because I have never used them they are too small but no complaints from the 6yo

I needed headphones for my son who would be starting back to school 1 day in person and 4 days virtual this upcoming school year.  These headphones allow him to work in the same room as I do without disturbing me as I am working from home.  I am happy with the volume control on these as he will also be using these with his ipad/chromebook for non-school related work which include video watching and music listening on youtube.  Great warranty with these as well - kids can be much tougher on products than adults so this is a big added benefit for me

They are nice headphones. Marketed for kids and the loudness setting is great! I love the option for kids to share what they are listening to & that’s what originally sold me. Just don’t loose or let the cord get ruined. The company does not offer replacement cords and good luck finding a double ended headphone jack that fits in them. I now have two pairs of useless headphones unless I buy another set due to not being able to replace the cord.

Edited to add: I still stand by my original review, but the company was gracious enough to send a replacement pair free of cost to make up for the first pair. I highly appreciate this level of customer service and so I have changed my star rating from 3 to 4!These were great for my kindergarten aged child until they weren't. Unfortunately about 9 months later only one side is producing sound. These are used maybe 2-3 times per week and still LOOK brand new, but unfortunately the quality doesn't seem to be there. Luckily they were not too expensive and are easy to replace, but it is still a disappointment.

They a great product for kids. My boys love them for sure. I like that you can hook up 2 headphones together. So if kids are sharing a tablet or phone both can hear so i thought that was neat. I just don't like the the safety volume control is right where the kids can see it. I feel it would have been better hidden on the ear muff or something like that. But great product no matter what

I bought this for my daughter to use with her Leap Frog Twist. Poor thing was holding it up to her head so she could hear it better and dancing around the house. So I found these, ler her choose her color and made the purchase. I honestly did not expect much from these, but they actually sound fantastic. We love that the fold up for storage, and they seem very durable. Buy with confidence.

These work quite well. The volume control on the side is basically just an on off switch that is supposed to keep them from pressing the volume buttons on their device, however, this feature did not work with my sons amazon fire tablet. Still overall, I am happy with the headphones.

My son loves these headphones. He is 5 and uses them mostly for speech sessions during distance learning. I like how they can’t be turned too loud by accident and harm his hearing. He also likes how he can pause a video on the cord just by pressing a button. We use these headphones with a Fire HD 8 kids edition.

Our elementary school age kids love these headphones! They are comfortable enough to wear during their 5+ hour remote learning sessions and as an added bonus, the wires can connect with other Mpow headphones, enabling our kids to listen and share music and videos together. Extremely happy with our purchase!

Bought 2 of these for my kids for travel. I have to say that i really like sound quality, the fact that they partially cancel noise, connect to each oher and fold. The only issue i have with them is that volume limiting switch is right on the cord and easily accessible for kids to change. A toddler doesn't understand the purpose of the switch but loves buttons. I really wish the switch was hidden somehow.

I bought these headphones for my 7 year old who is doing virtual courses this semester. She likes the color (aqua/purple) and comfort. She's used them for a few weeks, but just for a short periods, but hasn't complained at all. I've tried them on as well and they fit me (although understandably a little snug). They seem to be very sturdy and well made.

About 1 week after buying the headphones a very small crack begin to show at the top of the headphones, the crack got bigger and bigger and then a little before 1 month passed, the headphones completely snapped; see the pictures. the headphones were not abused or misused in any fashion. Besides for the headphones breaking, they did work soundwise very well.

I ordered these for my son primally for at home virtual school use. They’re his favorite pair he’s owned so far.
